T02TD2584E:107b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma aam ga'i ti gu hya b'anno po ka dzny'a na d'i pa n'a ma /
T02TD2584E:107b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub ba'i thabs kyi 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2584E:107b-4: ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:107b-5: dpal ldan khyab bdag lnga yi dngos //
T02TD2584E:107b-6: ye shes sku la rab btud de //
T02TD2584E:107b-7: don dam zab mo'i nges don la //
T02TD2584E:107b-9: bdag pas blo dman don la gzung ba dang //
T02TD2584E:107b-10: nges don gsum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang //
T02TD2584E:107b-11: bla ma'i gdams ngag ma thob rnal 'byor don ltos pa'i //
T02TD2584E:107b-12: gang zag rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:107b-14: rgyud las nges don btus te bshad //
T02TD2584E:107b-15: de la mdo'i don zhus shing slar gsungs pa'i thabs bstan pa dang /
T02TD2584E:107b-16: nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa gnyis las /
T02TD2584E:107b-17: 'dir mdo'i don zhus shing slar gsungs pa'i tshul bstan pa bshad de /
T02TD2584E:107b-18: gsang sngags kyi lugs kyis thig le byang chub kyi sems gtan la dbab dgos te /
T02TD2584E:107b-19: de'i don ni gnas pa bzhi /
T02TD2584E:107b-21: nyams su myong ba'i thabs bzhi /
T02TD2584E:107b-22: de'i 'bras bu bzhi la yang dag pa'i don 'dus pas de bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:107b-23: thig le bcu drug mi shigs dbus //
T02TD2584E:107b-25: de ltar gnyis med kyi ye shes rtogs pa'i dus na tshig dang yi ge'i sgros pa'i mtha' dang bral bas /
T02TD2584E:107b-26: yan lag med cing rtsis las 'das //
T02TD2584E:107b-28: de ltar rtog pa dang nyon mongs pa drug spyang ba'i gnyen por dbugs dbyung drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs bskyed la /
T02TD2584E:107b-29: de yang mi rtog pa'i sems kyis zin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:107b-30: de nyid ldan zhing yid rtog 'das //
T02TD2584E:107b-32: de lta bu'i don ni blo dang ldan pa kun gyis yang da ga pa'i gnas su 'gro ba'i lam yin par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:107b-33: nges 'byung kun gyi lam gang yin //
T02TD2584E:107b-35: don gsum dbyer med du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:107b-36: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blos //
T02TD2584E:108a-2: snang ba'i chos thams cad skye med kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-3: lus kyi mtha' ni nges rtogs bya //
T02TD2584E:108a-5: de lta bu'i don la gnas na phyin ci ma log pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-6: byang chub bla na med pa'o //
T02TD2584E:108a-8: de'i ngang la gsang sngags kyi don gyis 'gro ba'i blo sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-9: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02TD2584E:108a-11: de'i dang las sku rnam pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:108a-12: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba /
T02TD2584E:108a-14: de lta bu ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing brjod pa'i gnas yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-17: 'khor gyi gtso bos ston pa la mchod bstod byas nas 'gro ba'i don zhus pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ldan //
T02TD2584E:108a-19: lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches //
T02TD2584E:108a-20: nyid la snyan pa'i tshig dag gis //
T02TD2584E:108a-21: bstod nas mtshan gyi rim pa zhus //
T02TD2584E:108a-23: ston pas 'gro ba'i don du bsnyen pa bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-24: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-25: de la tshogs bsag pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-26: spyin sreg bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-27: na ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-28: shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-29: lus kyi rtsa gnas kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-30: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-31: dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2584E:108a-32: bla ma la yon dbul pa'i rim pa dang bcu gsungs pas na /
T02TD2584E:108a-33: blo zhan don du rim pas gsungs //
T02TD2584E:108a-35: de'i nyams su blang ba'i thabs la gnyis te /
T02TD2584E:108a-36: bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa gnyis so //
T02TD2584E:108a-37: sngon la bsnyen pa ston te /
T02TD2584E:108a-38: don dang ldan pa'i slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:108a-39: de la rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
T02TD2584E:108a-40: slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas te //
T02TD2584E:108a-42: de nas sgrub pa pos nyams dang gar 'thad du gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108a-43: bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun pa'i //
T02TD2584E:108a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig rkang lnga gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:108b-0: @108b la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'og padma 'dab brgyad du 'dug la /
T02TD2584E:108b-1: steng 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du 'dug pa /
T02TD2584E:108b-2: me tog gi snam bu lang ling du chags pa /
T02TD2584E:108b-5: lcug phran gyi tshal yod pa /
T02TD2584E:108b-6: bkra shis kyi phya sna tshogs sgra sgrogs pa de 'dra'i gnas su bsnyen pa bya ste /
T02TD2584E:108b-8: bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed pa /
T02TD2584E:108b-9: dam tshig la gnas pa bya ba'i las la ma rmongs pa'i brtse ba'i gro gas dang 'grogs par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108b-10: grogs bzad btsal la bsnyen pa brtsam //
T02TD2584E:108b-12: de nas don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa des bde ba'i stan nang tshangs can 'bol ba la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung ngam ji ltar bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02TD2584E:108b-16: sems khog glod de sgom pa brtan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108b-17: bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te //
T02TD2584E:108b-19: de nas rnam rtog gi bgegs bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:108b-20: bdag dang sa gzhi yongs bsrung zhing //
T02TD2584E:108b-21: ra ba dra bas mtshams bcad dang //
T02TD2584E:108b-22: phyogs dang steng 'og bcing sogs pa //
T02TD2584E:108b-23: rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya //
T02TD2584E:108b-25: de'i don ni mgon po kun snang gi rgyud las 'di skad du /
T02TD2584E:108b-26: kye ma lha yi bu rnams dang //
T02TD2584E:108b-27: gzhon nu rnams ni tsho 'dod dang //
T02TD2584E:108b-28: phyi rol rgol ba tshar gcod dang //
T02TD2584E:108b-29: rnam rtog bgegs rnams bsrung 'dod na //
T02TD2584E:108b-30: dang por stong pa chen por bsgom //
T02TD2584E:108b-31: de yi dang las rang gi dngos //
T02TD2584E:108b-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bsam //
T02TD2584E:108b-33: lce la zla ba rdo rje ni //
T02TD2584E:108b-34: rtse lnga par ni rnam bsams la //
T02TD2584E:108b-35: badzra dzi hva zhes brjod de /
T02TD2584E:108b-36: rdo rje'i lce ru rnam par bsam //
T02TD2584E:108b-37: sngags zlos nus pa'i mthu dang ldan //
T02TD2584E:108b-38: lag pa gnyis su aa dang h'um //
T02TD2584E:108b-39: gong ma'i go rims don dang ldan //
T02TD2584E:108b-40: badzra ha ta zhes brjod de //
T02TD2584E:108b-41: rdo rje rtse lnga lta bur bsam //
T02TD2584E:108b-42: phyag rgya nus pa'i mthu dang ldan //
T02TD2584E:108b-43: de nas bdag nyid h'um las ni //
T02TD2584E:108b-44: gri hna badzra sa ma ya bam h'um /
T02TD2584E:108b-45: zhes pa'i sngags ni brjod nas kyang //
T02TD2584E:108b-46: rdo rje ti r'inti ri bcing //
T02TD2584E:108b-47: khro bo chen po me ltar rab tu 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can //
T02TD2584E:108b-48: 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun du 'khrug pa /
T02TD2584E:109a-1: che ba la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02TD2584E:109a-2: phyag g-yas pa rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2584E:109a-6: phyag g-yon pa rnams na dril bu dang /
T02TD2584E:109a-9: kha tvam ga la btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:109a-10: me ser skya 'bar ba lta bu'i skra'i tshogs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2584E:109a-11: sbrul chen pos gdu bu dang dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2584E:109a-12: ska rags dang zhabs gdub dang /
T02TD2584E:109a-16: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo dgod pa la mkhas pa /
T02TD2584E:109a-17: g-yon brkyang bas khyab pa 'jug dang chung mar bcas pa gnon pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:109a-18: de nas skyil krung phyed 'dug la //
T02TD2584E:109a-19: rdo rje bsdams pas nang bcings te //
T02TD2584E:109a-20: mthe bong gnyis ni gzhi bas byas la //
T02TD2584E:109a-21: bsgreng ba'i sor mo'i steng nas dgab //
T02TD2584E:109a-22: ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109a-23: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka hum aa bhi shi nytsa m'am //
T02TD2584E:109a-24: gsang sngags dam pa brjod nas ni //
T02TD2584E:109a-25: spyi bo nas brtsams phyogs bzhi yi //
T02TD2584E:109a-26: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur blang //
T02TD2584E:109a-27: aom tum zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2584E:109a-28: go cha dam pa bgos nas ni //
T02TD2584E:109a-29: mthar ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2584E:109a-30: badzra tu shya ho: zhes brjod //
T02TD2584E:109a-31: lus kyi cha lugs mnyam par bya //
T02TD2584E:109a-32: de nyid las ni ma g-yos par //
T02TD2584E:109a-33: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag / g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ni //
T02TD2584E:109a-34: lan gsum dag tu gsor byas la //
T02TD2584E:109a-35: bgegs rnams thams cad bsnun par bya //
T02TD2584E:109a-36: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um /
T02TD2584E:109a-37: de nas sems kyi chos 'phrul gyi //
T02TD2584E:109a-38: skad cig re la ting 'dzin te //
T02TD2584E:109a-39: bsgyar te las rnams rim par bya //
T02TD2584E:109a-40: bdag nyid khro bo rdo rje me //
T02TD2584E:109a-41: g-yas ba rdo rje med dpal g-yon sdig mdzub //
T02TD2584E:109a-43: de yi cho 'phul las byung ba'i //
T02TD2584E:109a-44: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings te /
T02TD2584E:109a-45: sor mo nang du 'bar bar bya //
T02TD2584E:109a-46: bthe [*mthe?] bong rdo rjer bsgreng ba ni //
T02TD2584E:109a-47: rdo rje me yi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109a-48: bgegs rnams thams cad bsregs par bsam //
T02TD2584E:109a-49: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma th'a bha nydza ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:109a-50: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings byas te /
T02TD2584E:109a-51: mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2584E:109a-52: snyoms la steng du bzhag pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109a-53: rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109a-54: bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya //
T02TD2584E:109b-0: badzra ni tri bandha sarba @109b bighn'am /
T02TD2584E:109b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2584E:109b-2: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin bskor te //
T02TD2584E:109b-3: mgo yi steng du mdzub mo gnyis //
T02TD2584E:109b-4: lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-5: rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109b-6: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:109b-7: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-8: sku mdog dkar po kho bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-9: g-yas pa rdo rje g-yon sdigs mdzub //
T02TD2584E:109b-10: dpag tu med pas steng phyogs gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-11: rdo rje thal mo brkyang byas te /
T02TD2584E:109b-12: mthe bong gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis //
T02TD2584E:109b-13: mche ba lta bur byas pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-14: rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109b-16: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-17: sku mdog sngon po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-18: mche pa thogs pa dpag tu med //
T02TD2584E:109b-19: de nyid du ni rnam par gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2584E:109b-21: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel //
T02TD2584E:109b-22: mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sbyar te //
T02TD2584E:109b-23: bzlog nas spyi bor gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-24: rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109b-26: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-27: sku mdog dmar po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-28: gtsug tor dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:109b-29: dpag tu med pas shar phyogs gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2584E:109b-31: mkhrig ma gnyis ni mdud byas pa //
T02TD2584E:109b-32: rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:109b-33: aom h'um badzra p'a sha hr'i:/
T02TD2584E:109b-34: gsangs sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-35: sku mdog ser po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-36: zhags pa dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:109b-37: dpag tu med pas de nyid gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-38: lag pa rdo rje bsdams pa las //
T02TD2584E:109b-39: mthe bong gnyis ni sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2584E:109b-40: skyil mo krung du bcas pa las //
T02TD2584E:109b-41: mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam par gzhi bas //
T02TD2584E:109b-42: phye la mthe chung gnyis po ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-43: ba dan lta bur byas pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-44: rdo rje ba dan phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109b-45: aom badzra pa tam gi pa tam ki ni ra ta /
T02TD2584E:109b-46: gsangs sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-47: sku mdog dmar po kho bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-48: ba dan dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:109b-49: nub kyi phyogs su rnam par gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-50: rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya nyid //
T02TD2584E:109b-51: kha ru rnam par bstan pa ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-52: rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:109b-53: hr'i: badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2584E:109b-54: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:109b-55: sku mdog nag po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:109b-56: rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:109b-57: byang gi phyogs su rnam par gtams //
T02TD2584E:109b-58: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD2584E:110a-2: rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:110a-3: aom badzra gi sha re ru ta ma ta //
T02TD2584E:110a-4: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:110a-5: sgu mdog sngon po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:110a-6: rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:110a-7: lho yi phyogs su rnam bar gtams //
T02TD2584E:110a-8: rdo rje bsdams pas steng bzhag / aom badzra dri bho me bha bar ksha sarba sv'a t'a /
T02TD2584E:110a-9: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:110a-10: sku mdog smug po khro bo ni //
T02TD2584E:110a-11: tho ba dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02TD2584E:110a-12: 'og gi phyogs su rnam pa'i gtams //
T02TD2584E:110a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2584E:110a-14: ma khrig ma gnyis bsnol mthe chung gnyis //
T02TD2584E:110a-15: lcags kyu'i tshul du sprel byas la /
T02TD2584E:110a-16: mdzub mo'i sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng ba //
T02TD2584E:110a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:110a-20: grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2584E:110a-22: bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:110a-23: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:110a-24: nang du h'um mdzad ra bar gyur //
T02TD2584E:110a-25: de nyid las ni mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2584E:110a-26: gung mo gnyis ni rdo rjer byas //
T02TD2584E:110a-27: rdo rje las kyis phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:110a-29: gsang sngags dam pa brjod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:110a-30: phyi rol las kyi ra bar gyur //
T02TD2584E:110a-31: lag nyis rdo rje bsdams pa dang /
T02TD2584E:110a-33: phyi rol rdo rje dra bar bsam //
T02TD2584E:110a-35: lha yi rdzu 'phrul dag kyang rdugs //
T02TD2584E:110a-36: tshangs dang brgya byin stobs che ba //
T02TD2584E:110a-37: mnan te shar dang steng du bcings //
T02TD2584E:110a-38: don dam gsum gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:110a-39: phyogs bcu thams cad bcing bar 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:110a-41: de nas sa phyogs de'i lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad zhi zhing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:110a-42: de nas shin tu brtser ldan pas //
T02TD2584E:110a-43: sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya //
T02TD2584E:110a-45: bdag nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang ldan par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:110a-46: des 'og nas gsungs pa'i don rnams kyis sbyin pa'i ni lha klu la'o //
T02TD2584E:110a-47: sreg pa ni sa phyogs ki skyon no //
T02TD2584E:110a-48: mnyes pa ni dkyil 'khor kyi lha'o //
T02TD2584E:110a-50: tshogs bsogs pa'i lan lag go //
T02TD2584E:110a-51: de ltar bgegs bsrungs phyogs kyi skyon zhi bar byas nas gzod rten gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:110a-52: de nas bsnyen pa rab 'bad de //
T02TD2584E:110b-1: dgyes pa bskyed phyir 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2584E:110b-3: dgyes pa bskyed pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-4: 'khor lo ni sbrul tshogs dku'i lha tsho'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-6: nam mkhar bsgom par bya ba yin //
T02TD2584E:110b-9: mkha' la 'dus pa'i 'khor lo dang bcas pa zhes pa ste sprul lo //
T02TD2584E:110b-11: lag gi 'du byed bsgom cing bya //
T02TD2584E:110b-12: 'bru lnga gnas pa'i sor mo la //
T02TD2584E:110b-14: lag gi 'du byed ni phag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-16: 'bru lnga ldan pa ni gung mo la aom //
T02TD2584E:110b-20: mthe chung la aa: bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-21: mdzub mo'i mthe chung mdud byas la //
T02TD2584E:110b-22: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ste //
T02TD2584E:110b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2584E:110b-24: mdzub mo mthe chung lu gu rgyud //
T02TD2584E:110b-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02TD2584E:110b-28: thams cad 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:110b-29: zhes pa ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2584E:110b-30: ting nge 'dzin gsum dgos pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:110b-31: lnga ni bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i //
T02TD2584E:110b-32: gcig ni de'i ngo bo dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-33: drug ni dbugs dbyung drug go //
T02TD2584E:110b-34: gsum ni sku gsungs thugs so //
T02TD2584E:110b-37: aom manydzu shr'i badzra tsa kra h'um /
T02TD2584E:110b-39: bla ma dang mnyam sbyor 'dus pas /
T02TD2584E:110b-40: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gang yin pa'i dbu rgyan du bla ma bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-41: mnyam par shin tu bstod par bya //
T02TD2584E:110b-42: zhes pa ni mnyam pa ni bla ma dang po /
T02TD2584E:110b-43: shin tu bstod pa ni 'og nas 'byung pa'i 'dud la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-44: ae ma ni nam mkhar sprul pa'i lha tshogs la ngo mtshar che ba'o //
T02TD2584E:110b-45: ae ma yan lag 'dus pa'i zhes pa'i don du lus ngag yid gsum gyis sprul lo zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:110b-47: sbyor ba ni mchod pa'i rten sprul pa'o//
T02TD2584E:110b-48: 'di ni gsum las 'byung zhes pa ni sngags dang /
T02TD2584E:110b-49: phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gsum las 'byung ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:110b-50: de ltar sprul pa de mdun gyi nam mkhar dbang po'i mngon sum dang 'dra bar yid kyis mngon sum du gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:110b-51: de ltar mkha' la gsal bkod de //
T02TD2584E:111a-3: de ltar bsam pa de la mchod bstod bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:111a-4: dga' bas mchod la glu yis bstod //
T02TD2584E:111a-6: dga' bas mchod pa ni me tog la sogs pa dang yid kyis mchod pas so //
T02TD2584E:111a-7: glu yis bstod pa ni mchod pa de'i rjes la 'dud kyis bstod pa ste /
T02TD2584E:111a-8: mchog spyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2584E:111a-9: ces pa la sogs pa nyi shus bstod pa'o //
T02TD2584E:111a-10: dang pos mchod cing zhes pa ni gong ma la snyegs so //
T02TD2584E:111a-11: rjes yi rang dang bshags pa dang //
T02TD2584E:111a-12: gsol gdab phyag la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2584E:111a-13: bcu yi yan lag kun 'dus pas //
T02TD2584E:111a-14: zhes pa'i don ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD2584E:111a-15: gang dag phyogs rnams thams cad na //
T02TD2584E:111a-16: dus rnams thams cad rab bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111a-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2584E:111a-18: nyan thos bcas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:111a-19: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T02TD2584E:111a-20: sngon chad sdig pa ci bgyis pa //
T02TD2584E:111a-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni //
T02TD2584E:111a-22: dus rnams kun gyis bshags par bgyi //
T02TD2584E:111a-23: sems can kun la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:111a-24: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog ste //
T02TD2584E:111a-25: bla med dkon mchog gsum po la //
T02TD2584E:111a-26: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2584E:111a-27: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02TD2584E:111a-28: shes rab can la bdag dbul gyis //
T02TD2584E:111a-29: de rnams kun gyis bdag bzhes la //
T02TD2584E:111a-30: 'bras bu rgya chen stsal du gsol //
T02TD2584E:111a-31: sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang gnas pa //
T02TD2584E:111a-32: skye bo kun du spyod ba dang //
T02TD2584E:111a-33: rgyal ba'i bzhed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:111a-34: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas //
T02TD2584E:111a-35: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02TD2584E:111a-36: shes rab che dang nyan thos dang //
T02TD2584E:111a-37: rang rgyal rnams dang skye bo yi //
T02TD2584E:111a-38: dge ba de la rjes su smon //
T02TD2584E:111a-39: byang chub snying por nyer gnas pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111a-40: gang dag byang chub phyogs rtogs pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111a-41: bdag gis gsol bas rgyal ba rnams //
T02TD2584E:111a-42: 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol //
T02TD2584E:111a-43: bya ba thams cad byas nas ni //
T02TD2584E:111a-44: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das gnas pa //
T02TD2584E:111a-45: bdag gis gsol bas rgyas pa kun //
T02TD2584E:111a-46: nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' gsol //
T02TD2584E:111a-47: srid pa'i btson ra'i nang gnas pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111a-48: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111a-49: sangs rgyas skal dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:111a-50: sangs rgyas kun dang de yi sras //
T02TD2584E:111b-0: 'gro la @111b phan phyir gzhes rnams kyis //
T02TD2584E:111b-1: ji ltar smon pa de bzhin du //
T02TD2584E:111b-2: lus ngag yid gsum legs par smon //
T02TD2584E:111b-3: phyag la sogs pa'i bsod nams gang //
T02TD2584E:111b-4: tshad med bdag gis ci bsags pa //
T02TD2584E:111b-5: ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa bzhin //
T02TD2584E:111b-6: byang chub tu ni de dag bsngo //
T02TD2584E:111b-7: yan lag bcu po de dag la//
T02TD2584E:111b-8: skye bo gang zhig dang mos pa //
T02TD2584E:111b-9: nyes pa'i bag chags kun dag nas //
T02TD2584E:111b-10: gsang ba mnyes pa'i snod du rung //
T02TD2584E:111b-11: zhes cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:111b-12: bdag nyid rung bar 'gyur pa dang //
T02TD2584E:111b-14: de ltar tshogs bsags pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byad nas snod du rung bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:111b-15: de la dga' ba'i mdangs kyis bstod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:111b-16: tshigs bcad glu yis bstod pa bya //
T02TD2584E:111b-18: phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bcu dgu pa nas //
T02TD2584E:111b-20: nyid kyi mdangs bzang tshogs kyis ni //
T02TD2584E:111b-21: zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon cing //
T02TD2584E:111b-22: rig pa rnam par gsal gyur pa //
T02TD2584E:111b-24: ma sgribs zur phud gsal ba la //
T02TD2584E:111b-25: nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba //
T02TD2584E:111b-26: mi dmigs pa ni kun gyi sku //
T02TD2584E:111b-29: yid 'ong gsung gi skra sgrogs pa //
T02TD2584E:111b-30: dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen mdzod 'jam dpal khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2584E:111b-31: gang g'a'i chu thigs lta grangs med //
T02TD2584E:111b-32: 'jig rten khams na rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD2584E:111b-33: nyon mongs dri ma rab spangs pa /
T02TD2584E:111b-35: mche ba gtsigs shing sgyings pa yi //
T02TD2584E:111b-36: 'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2584E:111b-37: gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2584E:111b-39: rang gi sbyan [*spyan?] dang mdangs 'dra ba'i //
T02TD2584E:111b-40: autpala sngon po rab mdzes pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111b-41: lhung bzed phyag mchog rab bsnams pa'i //
T02TD2584E:111b-43: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2584E:111b-44: rgya cher bstod pa'i spyod pa gang //
T02TD2584E:111b-45: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
T02TD2584E:111b-48: byas pa'i 'bras bu yod par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:111b-49: dgyes pa'i bdag gi lha rnams kyis /
T02TD2584E:111b-50: snyan pa'i tshig gis legs par bsam //
T02TD2584E:112a-0: @112a * // dgyes pa ni gong du bstod pa'i lha rnams so //
T02TD2584E:112a-1: snyan pa'i tshig ni tshogs bsogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rigs kyis bu legs so zhes gnas pa byin par bsam mo //
T02TD2584E:112a-2: de ltar gnang bstsal bas don dang ldan te /
T02TD2584E:112a-3: drin la lan gyis glan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:112a-4: drin gyi tshul gyis slar bstod pa //
T02TD2584E:112a-6: de yang gtso bo lnga'i sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:112a-7: byang chub sems ni rab tu bzung //
T02TD2584E:112a-8: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02TD2584E:112a-9: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la bdud //
T02TD2584E:112a-10: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-11: de nas yum bzhi'i sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112a-12: me long ye shes ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2584E:112a-14: rdo rje dra ba'i las khyod 'dud //
T02TD2584E:112a-15: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-16: de nas nang gi sems dpa' bcu drug la bstod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112a-17: stong pa'i rang bzhin 'dod chags che //
T02TD2584E:112a-19: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2584E:112a-20: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-21: de nas lha mo brgyad la bstod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:112a-22: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
T02TD2584E:112a-24: rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2584E:112a-25: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-26: sgo skyong bzhi po'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:112a-27: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che //
T02TD2584E:112a-30: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-31: des nas bskal bzangs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug la bstod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112a-32: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02TD2584E:112a-34: pha rol phyin bcu'i gtso la 'dud //
T02TD2584E:112a-35: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:112a-36: de ltar bstod pa byed pa de //
T02TD2584E:112a-38: rigs kyi bu gang la las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la de ltar bstod pa byas pas phyir ring po mi thogs par 'jam dpal chos kyi rgyal po thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112a-41: gong du gsungs pa de rnams ni chos spyod thams cad kyi mchog kyang yin la thams cad kyi thog mar gyur pas /
T02TD2584E:112a-42: de dag ni mchog gi rgyal po zhes pa gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:112a-43: des yang dag pa'i don la sbyor zhing dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi thog mar yang 'gro la /
T02TD2584E:112a-44: de la ma yengs par gsal dgos pas na /
T02TD2584E:112a-45: sbyor pa'i 'khor lo dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:112b-0: de nas phyag lngas @112b nam mkha'i 'khor lo la mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112b-1: de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas //
T02TD2584E:112b-3: de nas gong du bstod pa byas pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:112b-4: rim pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:112b-6: thams cad nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs //
T02TD2584E:112b-8: btsal nas ci byed ce na /
T02TD2584E:112b-9: ma lus mnyes par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:112b-11: de gang gis btsal zhe na /
T02TD2584E:112b-12: phyag lnga zhes pa ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD2584E:112b-13: dpal gyi 'byung gnas 'jam dpal kun gyi dpal //
T02TD2584E:112b-14: mtha' dag byams pas khyab ba 'jam pa'i ngang //
T02TD2584E:112b-15: 'jam dang dpal du grags pas don dang ldan /
T02TD2584E:112b-16: 'jam dpal yang dag dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:112b-17: gzhon nu sku mdog gser mdangs 'od lam lam //
T02TD2584E:112b-18: rin chen mchog gi rgyan spras sa ler gsal //
T02TD2584E:112b-19: byin che dang pa'i thugs mnga' 'dzum pa po //
T02TD2584E:112b-20: gzi brjid mdzes dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:112b-21: yon tan gter gyi autpala phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2584E:112b-22: padma rgyas 'dra'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2584E:112b-23: lha yi lhar gyur cha lugs lha las 'phags //
T02TD2584E:112b-24: blta bas mi ngoms khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:112b-25: gzhon nu sprul pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad la //
T02TD2584E:112b-26: gang zhig yud tsam mthong pas 'dun pa skye //
T02TD2584E:112b-27: gang la ci 'dul de ltar sprul mdzad pa //
T02TD2584E:112b-28: thabs kyis 'dren pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:112b-29: rnam rtog spros las mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes //
T02TD2584E:112b-30: yod med rtag chad mtha' la mi 'jug pa //
T02TD2584E:112b-31: dmigs med mnyam pas chos kyi dbyings su gnas //
T02TD2584E:112b-32: yang dag don chen ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2584E:112b-34: tshom bu lnga zhes pa ni rigs lnga'o /
T02TD2584E:112b-35: mnyes par bya zhes pa ni phyag lnga'o /
T02TD2584E:112b-37: da ni byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:112b-38: de ltar mnyes pa'i 'og tu ni //
T02TD2584E:112b-40: gong ma ltar phyag lngas ye shes kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i rjes la /
T02TD2584E:112b-41: gzod byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:112b-42: ye shes sems dpa' mngon 'dod pas //
T02TD2584E:112b-43: zhes pa ni de ltar tshogs bsags nas /
T02TD2584E:112b-44: ye shes sems dpa' thob par bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pas /
T02TD2584E:112b-45: de gang gi sgo nas thob ce na /
T02TD2584E:112b-46: sems can yongs bsgral bsam pa dang //
T02TD2584E:113a-1: can thams cad 'khor ba'i 'dam las byang chub kyi skam sar bsgral par bya'o snyam ste /
T02TD2584E:113a-2: smon pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:113a-4: byang chub dam par smon par bya //
T02TD2584E:113a-6: de nas 'di dag gi tshig tu brjod ces pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2584E:113a-8: ma lus par ni skye bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:113a-9: zhes pa'i bar du bstan te go sla'o //
T02TD2584E:113a-10: de ni 'jug par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:113a-11: de nas sdom pa bzung ste /
T02TD2584E:113a-12: de'i don ni rnam pa drug ste /
T02TD2584E:113a-13: dkyus nyid na gsal bas 'dis ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2584E:113a-14: de ltar sdom pa bzung nas dbang nod par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:113a-15: de ltar sdom pa bzung byas la //
T02TD2584E:113a-17: de ltar ni gong du gsungs pa rnams so //
T02TD2584E:113a-18: sdom pa ni lus dag yid gsum gyi'o //
T02TD2584E:113a-19: 'dzin pa ni gong du gsungs pa de rnams bdag gis bzung la /
T02TD2584E:113a-20: gzod 'og nas 'byung ba'i dbang blang zhes pa'i don no //
T02TD2584E:113a-27: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang //
T02TD2584E:113a-28: de nas bzhi pa'i don bstan //
T02TD2584E:113a-29: de ltar brtul zhugs bzhi dang ldan pa la dbang dang dam tshig 'brel bar bstan pas na rim par zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:113a-30: de yang gang bskur zhe na /
T02TD2584E:113a-31: dbang bskur bzhi zhes gsungs te //
T02TD2584E:113a-32: de yang don dang ldan pa la thog ma bum pa nas bzhi ba'i bar bskur ba nas //
T02TD2584E:113a-33: kun rdzogs zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
T02TD2584E:113a-34: 'o na de'i ngo bo gang yin zhe na //
T02TD2584E:113a-35: spyi gtsug ces pas bum pa'i dbang dang /
T02TD2584E:113a-36: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD2584E:113a-37: zhes pas gsang ba'i dbang dang /
T02TD2584E:113a-38: lha bsnyen bya zhes pas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang /
T02TD2584E:113a-39: don dam zhes pas bzhi pa'i don bstan pa'o /
T02TD2584E:113a-40: don de ltar shes par byas la skabs 'dir dbang bcu po bskur bar byas te /
T02TD2584E:113a-42: h'um pra t'i tstsha badzra h'um /
T02TD2584E:113a-43: de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin pa ni /
T02TD2584E:113a-44: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2584E:113a-45: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya //
T02TD2584E:113a-46: aom badzra ha sya aunggha t'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:113a-48: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:113a-49: aom badzra ka la sha aa bhi shi nytsa h'um /
T02TD2584E:113a-50: aom buddha ka la sha aa bhi shi nytsa aom //
T02TD2584E:113a-51: aom ratna ka la sha aa bhi shi nytsa tr'am /
T02TD2584E:113b-0: aom padma ka la @113b sha aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD2584E:113b-1: aom karma ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02TD2584E:113b-2: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-3: aom buddha aa bhi shinytsa aom /

T02TD2584E:113b-6: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa aa:/

T02TD2584E:113b-8: aom badzra patta aa ba lom ba na aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD2584E:113b-9: aom badzra mu dra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-10: aom buddha mu dra aa bhi shinytsa aom /

T02TD2584E:113b-16: aom ratna n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa gr'am /
T02TD2584E:113b-17: aom padma n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa gr'i:/
T02TD2584E:113b-18: aom karma n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02TD2584E:113b-19: aom badzra ta kra aa bhi shinytsa h'um bhr'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-20: aom badzra tsa kra aa dhi ba ti aa bhi shinytsa aom aom aom /
T02TD2584E:113b-21: aom badzra tsa kra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shinytsa h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-22: aom badzra tsa kra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shinytsa tr'am tr'am tr'am /

T02TD2584E:113b-24: aom badzra dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-25: aom buddha dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02TD2584E:113b-26: aom ratna dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD2584E:113b-27: aom padma dha ra na aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD2584E:113b-28: aom karma dha ra na bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02TD2584E:113b-29: aom badzra gu hya aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2584E:113b-30: aom buddha gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02TD2584E:113b-31: aom ratna ku hya aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD2584E:113b-32: aom padma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02TD2584E:113b-33: aom karma gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aa:/
T02TD2584E:113b-34: aom pra dznyo pa yo sa ma yo ga aa bhi shinytsa h'um a'a: zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:113b-36: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba bo //
T02TD2584E:113b-38: de nas tshogs sogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bdag la bsgrub par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:113b-39: de nas nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs //
T02TD2584E:113b-41: de nas bi dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:113b-42: nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs ni tshogs mdun na sprul pa'i lha rnams so //
T02TD2584E:113b-43: ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2584E:113b-44: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhi go sla'o //
T02TD2584E:113b-45: slar gso lus dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2584E:113b-46: zhes pa rnam smin gyi phung po sbyangs nas ye shes kyi lus snang la rang bzhin med pa gsal la rnyog pa med pa 'jam tshon lta bu bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:113b-47: de yang rdo rje gur gyi rgyud las /
T02TD2584E:113b-48: ji ltar chu nang zla ba de //
T02TD2584E:113b-49: bden min brdzun pa med pa ltar //
T02TD2584E:114a-2: ; lus kyang rang bzhin rtog pa med //
T02TD2584E:114a-4: de nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa ni dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:114a-5: de nas zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-7: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal lo //
T02TD2584E:114a-8: 'khrul pa'i tshul du zhes pa'i dam tshig nyis ni dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ka nas aa las 'od 'phros //
T02TD2584E:114a-9: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-10: sgyu ma'i tshul du nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na a'a li dang k'a li skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur gyur te de ka la /
T02TD2584E:114a-11: skar ma'i tshogs 'dra rab bsgoms te //
T02TD2584E:114a-13: de las 'byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig bcu ni dkyus na gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:114a-14: byang chub sems ni rab bskyed dang /
T02TD2584E:114a-15: zhes pa'i gong du gsungs pa ltar sems can rnams kyi dug rnam pa lnga 'od zer gyis sbyangs nas //
T02TD2584E:114a-16: gzod byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-17: de yang ji ltar gzhug ce na /
T02TD2584E:114a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2584E:114a-20: de nas sngon par gzung ba dang bcu yongs sus dag pa ni sngon du bstan pas so //
T02TD2584E:114a-21: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rab bstan te //
T02TD2584E:114a-22: zhes pa ni mdzad pa bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2584E:114a-24: 'khor lo'i tshogs zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-25: phreng ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rim pa gsum sgo bar ma'i mu khyud dang bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-26: rdo rje dbyings dang lha zhes pa ni rdo rje dbyings dang lha rnams 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2584E:114a-27: de nas phyi rol dgod bya ba //
T02TD2584E:114a-28: zhes pa ni phyi ma man chad kyi rgyan bstan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-29: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba'i //
T02TD2584E:114a-30: zhes pa ni phyi'i rdo rje'i ra ba'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-31: ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2584E:114a-33: gzhal yas khang gi nang du'o //
T02TD2584E:114a-34: de yang gang du gzugs she na /
T02TD2584E:114a-35: phyogs re re nas rtsig pa la brten pa'i ka ba gnyis zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:114a-36: rdul tshon lnga po nyid kyis ni //
T02TD2584E:114a-38: dra ba dra phyed dag gis klubs //
T02TD2584E:114a-39: zhes pa ni dbus na mchog yod pa ni dra ba yin la dbus na mchog med pa ni dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-0: dkyil 'khor ni phyi rol du zhes pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor sgo @114b rgyan bstan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-1: ji ltar gsungs pa'i rtags thams cad //
T02TD2584E:114b-2: khyad par du ni mngon bsdus pa //
T02TD2584E:114b-3: de ni thams cad bya ba yin //
T02TD2584E:114b-4: zhes pa ni rta babs ni mchod rten lta bu'am /
T02TD2584E:114b-5: 'on te ci mdzes par byas la /
T02TD2584E:114b-6: rin po che'i tog dang chun 'phyangs dang mdzes pa'i g-yu bya kha sprod dang /
T02TD2584E:114b-7: dar la sogs pas phyi'i sku la brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-8: sgo yi rgyan dang tva ra na //
T02TD2584E:114b-9: shin tu gcig nyid mi bya'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-10: zhes pa ni nang gi dkyil 'khor la rta babs la sogs pa'i rgyan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-11: de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa rta babs med pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:114b-12: nang gi sgo la rgyan med la phyi'i sku la rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:114b-14: tva ra na rnams gdags pa yin //
T02TD2584E:114b-16: de nas lha rnams kyi gdan bskyed pa ni go rims bzhin lha rnams kyi zhes pa nas //
T02TD2584E:114b-17: yid kyi yul de goms par bya //
T02TD2584E:114b-18: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te dkyus na gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:114b-19: de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni de dag gi gong du gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
T02TD2584E:114b-20: gzhi ni yang dag pa'i gzhi yin pas gzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-21: de don nan tan du ma g-yengs par bya dgos pas ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:114b-22: de nas rkyen gyis bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:114b-23: de nas rkyen gyis bslang ba ni //
T02TD2584E:114b-25: de nas de ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-26: rkyen gyis bslang ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i lha tshogs bskyed pa'i rkyen no //
T02TD2584E:114b-27: de dbus 'khor lo ni 'khor lo drug tu rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD2584E:114b-29: shes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad bskyed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:114b-30: de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na /
T02TD2584E:114b-31: stong ba'i ngang las chu la chu bur rdol ba'i tshul du pam las seng ge'i khri'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma las nyi ma /
T02TD2584E:114b-32: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba lta bu //
T02TD2584E:114b-33: de steng rig pa aa dkar por gyur pa las 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:114b-34: de yongs su gyur pa las gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-36: padma seng ge'i zla seng du //
T02TD2584E:114b-37: a'a: las bskyed pa'i rtag pa pos //
T02TD2584E:114b-38: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2584E:114b-39: zhes pa de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:114b-40: rnam snang de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
T02TD2584E:114b-41: rnam thar bzhi ldan kun du zhal //
T02TD2584E:115a-0: @115a * // rnam thar bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02TD2584E:115a-3: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-4: ldan pa ni de mda' ba'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-5: kun du zhal ni zhal bzhi ba'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-6: de yang phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa nas //
T02TD2584E:115a-7: phyogs bzhi'i slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:115a-8: rnam snang zhal bzhi phyogs bzhir gzigs //
T02TD2584E:115a-11: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dha'i: dkar po dha'i: yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas stobs lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su zhal lnga pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-12: de ka la rnam snang chen po'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du yi ge dha'i: dkar po las dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-14: shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i busti re re bsnams pa'o zhes pa ni //
T02TD2584E:115a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung dum bu bzhir bgos te /
T02TD2584E:115a-18: stong pa nyid kyi dum bu dang /
T02TD2584E:115a-19: rnam dag gi dum bu dang /
T02TD2584E:115a-20: mtshan dpe'i dum bu dang bzhi rnams so //
T02TD2584E:115a-21: de yang autpa la re'i steng na'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-22: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgom ste ji skad du //
T02TD2584E:115a-23: dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru //
T02TD2584E:115a-24: shes rab 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02TD2584E:115a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:115a-26: rgyu rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi gnyen par sgra'i yi ge bcu gnyis bsgoms pas 'bras bu sa mchog bcu gnyis thob ste /
T02TD2584E:115a-27: de yang rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
T02TD2584E:115a-28: kun du 'od kyis chen po nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs te nyi ma dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-29: gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dug la rtsi gtong ba dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2584E:115a-31: sa gsum pa ste nam mkha'i 'od ni chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' bzhin du so sor snang ba'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-32: sa bzhi pa rdo rje'i 'od de yid bde ba ste ;
T02TD2584E:115a-33: bde ba stong pa dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-34: sa lnga pa ni rin po che'i 'od de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste dgos pa thams cad skong bar dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2584E:115a-35: sa drug pa ste padma'i 'od de 'dod chags dang mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-0: sa bdun pa las kyi 'od de sangs rgyas @115b kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-1: sa brgyad pa dpe med pa ste dpe las 'das pa dpe ru yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-2: sa dgu pa dpe dang ldan te /
T02TD2584E:115b-4: sa bcu pa ni shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ste /
T02TD2584E:115b-5: shes rab kyis ni don thams cad 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-6: sa bcu gcig pa ni bla na med pa'i sa rab tu 'od gsal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T02TD2584E:115b-7: sa bcu gnyis pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ye shes rab tu so sor rig pa rdzogs pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:115b-8: de ltar rgyu 'bras kyi don bshad nas //
T02TD2584E:115b-9: da ni 'khor lo bsgom pa'i thabs bshad de //
T02TD2584E:115b-10: don byas slar 'dus zhes pa la sogs pa dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:115b-11: sa mchog bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su //
T02TD2584E:115b-13: sa mchog bcu gnyis ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-14: sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya //
T02TD2584E:115b-15: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:115b-22: de'i don ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsal bar gsungs te de la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:115b-24: thun mong ma yin gnyis med khyab pa'i chos //
T02TD2584E:115b-25: dus gsum btang snyoms rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
T02TD2584E:115b-26: chos dbyings yum nyid sems dpa' sras mchog ston //
T02TD2584E:115b-27: blo dang ldan pa gang zhig mdo 'di ni //
T02TD2584E:115b-28: mngon sum tshad mar bzhag nas mthong 'dod pa //
T02TD2584E:115b-29: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2584E:115b-30: yi ge 'khor lo'i don gyis 'jam dpal lo /
T02TD2584E:115b-31: gdod nas dag cing skye ba med pa yi //
T02TD2584E:115b-32: aa a'a zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa'i chos //
T02TD2584E:115b-33: rgyu nyid med pas 'bras bu mi tshol phyir //
T02TD2584E:115b-34: aa ltar mnyam gzhag chos kyi sku nyid de //
T02TD2584E:115b-35: don dam dbyings nyid mkha' 'dra dmigs med khyab //
T02TD2584E:115b-36: 'byung ba rang bzhin med par gnas pa las //
T02TD2584E:115b-37: 'jam dpal ral gris btab nas gcod pa ltar //
T02TD2584E:115b-38: aa yi gu gu thugs rje rang nis 'phyo //
T02TD2584E:115b-39: ai a'i zhes pa chos ki yum nyid lam //
T02TD2584E:115b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bsam pa'i dbyings //
T02TD2584E:115b-41: lha dang mi la blang dor med tshul gyis //
T02TD2584E:115b-42: thun mong ma yin stong nas kun du bzang //
T02TD2584E:115b-43: med pa'i ngang nyid med las 'byung ba yi //
T02TD2584E:115b-44: au a'u zhes pa med pa'i snying po 'byung //
T02TD2584E:115b-45: ye shes chen po yod med mtha' las 'das //
T02TD2584E:116a-0: @116a * // che ba'i ngang gis 'gro kun dge la sbyor //
T02TD2584E:116a-1: gnyis dang gnyis med gtan nas brjod bral ba'i //
T02TD2584E:116a-2: gru gsum ae yi rang bzhin nyid mi g-yo //
T02TD2584E:116a-3: ae aee zhes pa tha snyad bsam brjod bral //
T02TD2584E:116a-4: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:116a-5: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
T02TD2584E:116a-6: ao aoo zhes pa 'du 'phro 'khrug med cing //
T02TD2584E:116a-7: 'ja' tshon rnam par so sor yid bzhin sbyor //
T02TD2584E:116a-8: 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i bde ba che //
T02TD2584E:116a-9: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor ba'i dpal //
T02TD2584E:116a-10: nam mkha' mi dmigs aam ste ye shes brjod //
T02TD2584E:116a-11: ye shes ma 'dres aa yig dbyings su 'dres //
T02TD2584E:116a-12: stong nyid ci la'ang ma reg lhun gyis grub //
T02TD2584E:116a-13: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
T02TD2584E:116a-14: bdag nyid rang bzhin gzhan dang mnyam pas na //
T02TD2584E:116a-15: bsam gyis mi khyab mi gnas mi sems na //
T02TD2584E:116a-16: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam //
T02TD2584E:116a-18: aa ni gdod ma nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pa /
T02TD2584E:116a-19: rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'bras bu btsal du med pas gdod ma nas chos nyid bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD2584E:116a-20: ai ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab chen pos de ltar gcod cing mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'phro bas shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2584E:116a-21: au ni de lta bas na kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD2584E:116a-22: mtshan ma ldang ba la mi dor //
T02TD2584E:116a-23: mi ldang ba la mi gnas kun du bzang po'i mtha' las 'das pa chen po'o //
T02TD2584E:116a-24: ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2584E:116a-25: ae de ltar bsam brjod dang bral bas sems dang sems kyi rnam par rtog pa g-yo ba med pa ste ;
T02TD2584E:116a-26: 'jam dpal gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:116a-27: aom ni de ltar yin pas thabs kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang bas /
T02TD2584E:116a-28: thams cad du yang thabs shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs yin te /
T02TD2584E:116a-29: nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin du 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi yid dang mthun par sbyor ba rnams rol ba'i cho 'phrul bde ba chen por mnyam pa'o //
T02TD2584E:116a-30: aam thams cad 'byung gnas nam mkha'i mdzod do //
T02TD2584E:116a-31: aa: ni de ltar na shes rab dang ye shes chos thams cad rag ma lus pa'i 'dus pa ste /
T02TD2584E:116a-32: de ltar yi ge bcu gnyis kyi chos thams cad gdod ma nas blang dor med par rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa ste /
T02TD2584E:116b-0: @116b de ltar yin par blo la gsal zhing mi g-yon des 'jam dpal nyid yin no //
T02TD2584E:116b-1: yang rgyud de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02TD2584E:116b-2: ji ltar sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02TD2584E:116b-4: rgyal ba rnams kyi yab dang yum //
T02TD2584E:116b-5: don gyi shes rab dbyings kyi phyir //
T02TD2584E:116b-6: thabs kyi ye shes kun 'byung ba //
T02TD2584E:116b-7: yi ge 'khor lo don rnams kyis //
T02TD2584E:116b-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba nyid du gsal //
T02TD2584E:116b-9: grags ma thag tu don der gsal //
T02TD2584E:116b-10: aa a'a zhes pa 'jam dpal nyid //
T02TD2584E:116b-11: rang bzhin chos nyid sku yi dbyings //
T02TD2584E:116b-12: ai a'i zhes pa g-yo ba med //
T02TD2584E:116b-13: mi bskyod pa las yum du gsal //
T02TD2584E:116b-14: au a'u zhes pa skye ba med //
T02TD2584E:116b-15: dag pa'i ngang nyid kun du bzang //
T02TD2584E:116b-16: rgyud las rgyal ba'i sems dpa' che //
T02TD2584E:116b-17: ye shes ngang nyid gcig pa'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-18: ae aee zhes pa mkha' la bskor //
T02TD2584E:116b-19: 'bras bu med pas mkha' la gnas //
T02TD2584E:116b-20: de ma thag las gsal ba'i rkyen //
T02TD2584E:116b-21: 'jam dbyangs phra ba'i dpal gyur pa //
T02TD2584E:116b-22: ao aoo zhes pa ae las 'das //
T02TD2584E:116b-23: aom zhes gsang sngags thabs chen bstan //
T02TD2584E:116b-24: ae dang ao yi rang bzhin dbyings //
T02TD2584E:116b-25: mum ni ngo bo nyid kyi mkha' //
T02TD2584E:116b-26: aa las rnam par rol pas bstan //
T02TD2584E:116b-27: aom gyi gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:116b-28: zab mo'i rdo rje ting 'dzin mtha' //
T02TD2584E:116b-29: ma zhes mnyam dang mi mnyam med //
T02TD2584E:116b-30: 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje rdzogs //
T02TD2584E:116b-33: mi gnas rdo rje rtse mo can //
T02TD2584E:116b-34: bsam rtsol sgrub pa med pa yi //
T02TD2584E:116b-35: dbyings nyid gzhan na yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD2584E:116b-37: tshul 'di yang snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-38: de la re zhig yang aa a'a zhes pa 'jam dpal chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-39: ai a'i ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-40: au a'u ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD2584E:116b-41: sems nyid sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2584E:116b-42: ae aee ni 'du 'bral med pa'i mkha' la sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-43: ao aoo ni de las 'dus pa'i ye shes 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi thabs mkha' pa'i 'phrul pa rang bzhin gyis 'phro ba'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-44: ao la aam sbyar na aom du 'gyur te /
T02TD2584E:116b-45: de ni gsang sngags kyi mthu'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-46: aam gi klad kor ni mum ste chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba'o //
T02TD2584E:116b-47: aom aam ni yon tan thams cad 'byor pa gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:117a-1: kor gyi ma ni chos mnyam pa nyid bar mi mnyam pa dbyar med pa ste /
T02TD2584E:117a-2: 'di lta bu'i 'jam dpal rdo rje ni mi gnas pa'i ye shes rdo rje rtse mo ste 'di lta bu'i don khong du chud par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:117a-3: ci sbyad pa thams cad thabs shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba chos nyid kyis brgyan /
T02TD2584E:117a-4: ye shes kyi rol pa bkag pa med pa'i chos nyid lhun gyis grub par rtogs nas /
T02TD2584E:117a-5: gzod ye shes kyi ngo bo dang ldan pa'o zhes 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:117a-6: 'khor lo lce la bsam pa ni zhes pa de ltar mu khyud kyi yig 'bru bkod nas rtsibs la 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags gtso bo drug po 'di dgod de zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:117a-7: dang po'i lce zhes pa ni gtso bo'i mdun gang yin pa'o //
T02TD2584E:117a-8: brtsams nas ni zhes pa dang po'i lce la badzra t'i kashan ya te na ma: zhes pa dgod pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:117a-10: de nas ye shes sems dpa' gsal par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:117a-11: de nas 'khor lo de dbus su //
T02TD2584E:117a-12: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams te /
T02TD2584E:117a-13: yi ge aa ni gsal bkod de //
T02TD2584E:117a-14: zhes pa'i bar gsal te dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:117a-15: de nas 'phro 'du'i sgo nas sems gzung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:117a-16: de nas 'khor lo la gnas sngags //
T02TD2584E:117a-18: de nyid brtan par bdag nyid bsgom //
T02TD2584E:117a-19: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
T02TD2584E:117a-20: de la 'bras bu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:117a-21: de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' ni /
T02TD2584E:117a-23: nye bar bzung nas mngon snang ngo //
T02TD2584E:117a-24: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
T02TD2584E:117a-25: de dag ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste /
T02TD2584E:117a-26: sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:117a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:117a-28: de nas da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha dag gi ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:117a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo aa las bskyed pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2584E:117a-30: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad de yig 'bru dang /
T02TD2584E:117a-32: ting nge 'dzin gsum las bskyed do ;
T02TD2584E:117a-33: / yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang aa dang phyag mtshan gsum las bskyed do //
T02TD2584E:117a-34: yang na lus ngag yid gsum las bskyed do //
T02TD2584E:117a-35: lha thams cad rdo rje'i cho ga yan lag gsum las bskyed de gsal bar bsgom /
T02TD2584E:117b-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas gdong lnga pa phyag brgyad pa de'i @117b thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo gsal bar bsgom /
T02TD2584E:117b-1: de'i lte ba la ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa sku mdog dung dang ba so ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2584E:117b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa aindra n'i la'i ral pa mnga' ba /
T02TD2584E:117b-3: phyag gnyis na autpa la sngon dmar mnga' ba zhi ba'i dang tshul dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:117b-4: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba bsgom //
T02TD2584E:117b-5: de la yi ge aa gnas pa de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-6: ye shes sems dpa' snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-7: dang po'i sangs rgyas snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-8: gtso bo rnam snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-9: gdan dang gzhal yas khang snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-10: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-11: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-12: ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon zhing khams drug snang bar byas te /
T02TD2584E:117b-18: 'od zer can snang bar byas so ;
T02TD2584E:117b-19: ; sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i las byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-21: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-22: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des /
T02TD2584E:117b-23: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-24: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:117b-27: dang po'i sangs rgyas snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-28: shes rab 'khor lo snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-29: ye shes sems dpa' snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas //
T02TD2584E:117b-31: aa la thim pas aa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shar phyogs nas brtsams te mi bskyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02TD2584E:117b-32: lho nas rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02TD2584E:117b-33: nub nas snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02TD2584E:117b-34: byang nas don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams rgyu'i sa bon gyi yig 'brur gyur to //
T02TD2584E:117b-36: aa a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ti hra da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02TD2584E:117b-37: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'an dzany'a na m'u rti b'a g'a shva ra /
T02TD2584E:117b-40: ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzany'a na garbaha a'a: sngags de brjod pas so so'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD2584E:117b-41: rang rang gi sa bon aa la sogs pa 'phros pas /
T02TD2584E:117b-42: rang rang gi sku mdog gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD2584E:117b-43: so so'i gnas su bkod la /
T02TD2584E:118a-1: yan lag gsum gyis gong du bskyed pa ltar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-2: 'di dag lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:118a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi lha rnams dgod de /
T02TD2584E:118a-4: shar gyi 'khor lo la sa bon h'um /
T02TD2584E:118a-5: mi bskyod pa gdan glang po che /
T02TD2584E:118a-7: sku mdog sngon ngo gnyen po zhe sdang ngo //
T02TD2584E:118a-8: lho'i 'khor lo la sa bon aom /
T02TD2584E:118a-14: nub kyi 'khor lo la sa bon hr'i: snang ba mtha' yas /
T02TD2584E:118a-19: byang phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sa bon aa: / don yod grub pa /
T02TD2584E:118a-23: gnyen po phrag dog phung po rnam lnga gnas su dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-24: shar lho'i zla ba'i steng du aa'i sa bon las byung ba sems ma rdo rje ma sku mdog dkar mo ;
T02TD2584E:118a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-26: lho nub kyi zla steng du aa'i sa bon las byung bar rin chen sems ma /
T02TD2584E:118a-28: rin po che 'dzin pa mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-29: nub byang gi zla steng du aam gi sa bon las byung ba chos kyi sems ma sku mdog dmar mo padma 'dzin pa /
T02TD2584E:118a-30: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sgo smon pa med pa stong pa /
T02TD2584E:118a-31: byang shar gyi zla steng du aa'i sa bon las byung ba /
T02TD2584E:118a-32: las kyi sems ma sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dus ma byas stong pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-33: lha mo bzhi po 'di dag ni brjod pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-34: rgyu 'byung ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-35: de'i phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs dang po'i steng du gdan zla ba /
T02TD2584E:118a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2584E:118a-38: phyag mtshan ral gri dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:118a-39: nang stong pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-44: phyag mtshan ral gri dang se gol /
T02TD2584E:118a-45: chen po stong pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-50: phyag mtshan ral gri dang mda' gzhu'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-51: phyi nang stong pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118a-53: rdo rje legs pa sku mdog dkar dmar /
T02TD2584E:118a-54: phyag mtshan ral gri dang se gol /
T02TD2584E:118b-0: @118b chen po stong pa rnam par dag pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-1: dam tshig gi sems dpa' bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-3: rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po /
T02TD2584E:118b-4: ral gri dang rin po che 'dzin pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-5: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-7: rdo rje rgyal mtshan sngo bsangs ral gri dang rgyal mtshan /
T02TD2584E:118b-8: thog ma med pa'i stong pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-11: ral gri dang nyi ma bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-12: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-15: sku gser mdog / ral gri dang tshems /
T02TD2584E:118b-19: rdo rje chos dmar po ral gri dang padma /
T02TD2584E:118b-20: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid /
T02TD2584E:118b-25: dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid /
T02TD2584E:118b-28: 'khor lo dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-30: sa bon aa: rdo rje smra ba zla ba'i mdog / ral gri dang lce /
T02TD2584E:118b-31: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-35: ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD2584E:118b-36: chos thams cad stong pa nyid /
T02TD2584E:118b-39: ral gri cho ga rgyu'i stong pa nyid /
T02TD2584E:118b-41: rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po ral gri dang mche ba /
T02TD2584E:118b-44: rdo rje khu tshur khro bo ral gri dang khu tshur bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-45: rgyu 'bras stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-46: phrin las kyi sems dpa' bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-47: da ni lam gyis bsdus pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02TD2584E:118b-48: sgo ba bzhi dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:118b-49: shar lhor la'i sa bon las byung ba /
T02TD2584E:118b-50: lha mo sgeg mo dkar mo 'gying ba'i tshul phyag mtshan ral gri sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-51: lho nub du m'a'i sa bon las byung ba phreng ba ma ser mo phreng ba dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-52: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-53: nub byang du g'i'i sa bon las byung ba glu ma dmar mo pi wang dang ral gri 'dzin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-54: byang shar du nri'i sa bon las byung ba gar ma ljang gu gar dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
T02TD2584E:118b-55: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-56: lha mo bzhi po 'di dag zla ba'i gdan la sems dpa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:118b-57: dh'u'i sa bon las byung ba bdug spos ma dkar mo spos khang dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:119a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @119a * //
T02TD2584E:119a-2: pu'i sa bon las byung ba me tog ma ser mo me tog dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2584E:119a-3: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-4: d'i'i sa bon las byung ba mar me ma dmar mo mar me dang ral gri 'dzin pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-5: ga'i sa bon las byung ba dri chab ma ljang gu dung phor dang ral gri 'dzin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-6: lha mo bzhi po 'di dag zla ba'i gdan la rim bzhin du bzhugs so //
T02TD2584E:119a-7: dza: 'i sa bon las sgo ba lcags kyu ma dkar mo lcags kyu dang ral gri 'dzin pa shes rab kyi stobs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-8: h'um gi sa bon las zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa dang ral gri 'dzin pa dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-9: bam gi sa bon las lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog dang ral gri bsnams pa dad pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-10: ho:'i sa bon las dril bu ma ljang gu dril bu dang ral gri bsnams pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-11: sgo ba bzhi po 'di dag kyang zla ba'i gdan la rim bzhin du bzhugs so //
T02TD2584E:119a-12: 'bras bu'i sems dpa' bcu drug ni aa'i sa bon las byams pa /
T02TD2584E:119a-15: ye shes tog dang bzhi g-yas ral gri g-yon rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-16: aa'i sa bon las bzang skyong /
T02TD2584E:119a-19: spobs pa brtsegs pa bzhi sku mdog ser po rin po che dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-20: aa'i sa bon las mthu chen thob /
T02TD2584E:119a-24: sku mdog dmar po ral gri dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-25: aa'i sa bon las zla 'od gzhon nu /
T02TD2584E:119a-30: sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-31: sems dpa' de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la zla ba'i gdan la rim pa bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119a-32: 'di yan chod ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:119a-33: de nas las rgyal mchog bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:119a-34: de nas las kyi khyad par yang /
T02TD2584E:119a-35: bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste //
T02TD2584E:119a-36: sgra las phye ste rgyas bshad pa /
T02TD2584E:119a-37: 'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02TD2584E:119b-0: de nas ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog @119b bsgom pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119b-1: las kyi ni las gsum ste /
T02TD2584E:119b-3: khyad par yang ni sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119b-4: bskyed pa'i zhir las byung ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed ba'i dus su /
T02TD2584E:119b-5: bdag las mi gnyis ba'i gzugs 'od zer gyi tshul du 'phros te /
T02TD2584E:119b-6: sangs rgyas la mchod pa phul nas /
T02TD2584E:119b-7: sems can gyi don la gsol ba 'debs pa ste /
T02TD2584E:119b-9: mi bskyod 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2584E:119b-10: zhe sdang can gyi rgyud sbyongs shig / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:119b-11: de nas sgra las phye ste rgyas par der bshad pas /
T02TD2584E:119b-12: skabs 'dir slob dpon gyis rgyas par ma bshad do //
T02TD2584E:119b-13: de nas yang gong du gsungs pa ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:119b-14: de yan chod ni las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2584E:119b-15: de nas de rdzogs par byed pa'i yan lag bstan par byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:119b-16: de nas spos kyi chu dag las /
T02TD2584E:119b-17: sngags bzlas pa yis bsang bya ste //
T02TD2584E:119b-18: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2584E:119b-19: de nas las bcos pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2584E:119b-20: spos kyi chu ni bsang chu'o //
T02TD2584E:119b-21: sngags bzlas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //
T02TD2584E:119b-22: bsang ba ni mchod pa'i rdzas rnams so //
T02TD2584E:119b-23: phung pos bsdus pa'i mchod pa lnga //
T02TD2584E:119b-25: 'byung ba lnga yis bskyed pa'i me tog dang /
T02TD2584E:119b-30: de ka la rim pa bzhin zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:119b-31: byin gyis brlab ces pa ni so so'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2584E:119b-37: zhes re re la'ang lan brgya 'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
T02TD2584E:119b-38: 'on te bdun bdun bzlas pas shin tu mang zhing rgya che bar bsam mo //
T02TD2584E:119b-39: de nas ye shes sems dpa' sgrub ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:119b-40: 'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis //
T02TD2584E:119b-41: zhes pa la sogs ba gsungs te /
T02TD2584E:119b-43: de yang rigs bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2584E:119b-44: lag gi 'du byed chen po yin //
T02TD2584E:119b-45: gar thabs g-yas g-yon bskor nas ni //
T02TD2584E:119b-46: se gol mang po brdab bar bya //
T02TD2584E:119b-47: badzra sa ma ya dza: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2584E:119b-48: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na //
T02TD2584E:119b-49: gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02TD2584E:119b-50: 'khor lo'i tshogs mchog thams cad kun //
T02TD2584E:120a-1: ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:120a-2: de lta bu'i don yid kyis mngon sum du byon pa de la mchod pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2584E:120a-3: mnyam med la sogs pas bstod pa bya ste zhes pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:120a-4: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid chos mchog can //
T02TD2584E:120a-5: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro drug sdug bsngal sel //
T02TD2584E:120a-6: yon tan mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa //
T02TD2584E:120a-7: dri med mnyam nyid dam pa nyid la bstod //
T02TD2584E:120a-8: yon tan shin tu phra ba tshad med de //
T02TD2584E:120a-9: nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa min //
T02TD2584E:120a-10: dngos grub mnyam med dpe bral ba //
T02TD2584E:120a-11: 'gro la nges par stsol mdzad bstod //
T02TD2584E:120a-12: rtag tu dri med thugs rje 'byung //
T02TD2584E:120a-14: 'gro ba'i don sgrub mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2584E:120a-15: bdag nyid rtag tu snang la bstod //
T02TD2584E:120a-16: tshad med tshad bral yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD2584E:120a-17: bde gshegs go 'phang bde brnyes kyang //
T02TD2584E:120a-19: bzang po shin tu mchog ldan bstod //
T02TD2584E:120a-20: mchog sbyin nang na mchog brnyes pas //
T02TD2584E:120a-21: kun la dngos grub mchog thob mdzad //
T02TD2584E:120a-22: mgon po dus gsum sgrib med pa //
T02TD2584E:120a-23: dngos grub dam pa stsol la bstod //
T02TD2584E:120a-24: de nas gtso bo'i sngags ring la zhes ba ni /
T02TD2584E:120a-25: aa a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ti hri da ya /
T02TD2584E:120a-28: bha ga b'an dzany'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa /
T02TD2584E:120a-30: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2584E:120a-31: dharmma dh'a tu dzany'a na garbha a'a: dri shyas blta /
T02TD2584E:120a-32: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gnyis med bstim /
T02TD2584E:120a-33: aa ham gis nga rgyal bya /
T02TD2584E:120a-34: aom badzra yaksha zhes pas bgegs bsal lo //
T02TD2584E:120a-35: de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bstan ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:120a-36: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub / ces gsungs te //
T02TD2584E:120a-37: bzhi ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
T02TD2584E:120a-39: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2584E:120a-41: phyag rgya chen po dang bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:120a-42: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2584E:120a-43: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la /
T02TD2584E:120a-44: phyag g-yon thams cad na rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:120a-45: lce la yi ge hr'i: las padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:120a-46: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar por bsams la /
T02TD2584E:120b-0: de'i lce la yi ge aa bsams te sngags kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ni chos kyi phyag @120b rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-1: aa las sna tshogs rdo rje lha thams cad kyi spyi bor bsams la /
T02TD2584E:120b-2: gar las byung ba'i g-yas thams cad na ral gri bsam pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-3: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su mthun par gang dang gang gi gzugs su gsal zhing de'i ngo bo rnam par dag pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-4: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa de la yang dag pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
T02TD2584E:120b-5: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog 'grub //
T02TD2584E:120b-8: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
T02TD2584E:120b-9: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag //
T02TD2584E:120b-11: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02TD2584E:120b-13: de nas mchod ba'i bye brag gis /
T02TD2584E:120b-15: mchod rdzas rnams bsangs la byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2584E:120b-16: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis mchod do //
T02TD2584E:120b-18: bdag las mi gnyis ba de yis so //
T02TD2584E:120b-19: de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i bstod pas kyang bstod do //
T02TD2584E:120b-20: mchod nas phyag rgya bzhi bya ba //
T02TD2584E:120b-22: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:120b-23: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o zhes pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:120b-24: aa las 'od byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas /
T02TD2584E:120b-25: de las ye shes sems dpa' de las shes rab 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:120b-26: de las dang po'i sangs rgyas de las gzhi'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:120b-27: de las lha tshogs de las gzhal yas khang de las sna tshogs rdo rje de las chos 'byung /
T02TD2584E:120b-28: de las byang chub chen po'i mchod rten /
T02TD2584E:120b-29: de las rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
T02TD2584E:120b-30: shar phyogs dge ba'i sgo la sogs pa nas 'od zer 'thon te /
T02TD2584E:120b-33: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te /
T02TD2584E:120b-34: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs kar zhugs /
T02TD2584E:120b-35: dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02TD2584E:120b-36: shes rab dang ye shes kyi bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:120b-37: slar rim gyis bzhi po'i aa la thim ste /
T02TD2584E:120b-38: snang stong gnyis med kyi ngo bor rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-39: de ltar 'phro 'du bya zhing bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-40: aom sarba dharma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shu dadha badzra aa a'a aam aa: zhes rtsa ba'i sngags bzla zhing 'phro 'du byed pa ni bsnyen pa 'bring po'o //
T02TD2584E:120b-41: bsnyen pa rgyas pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin na /
T02TD2584E:121a-3: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-4: tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi brjod pas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las yi ge brgyad cu rtsa drug 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por gyur te /
T02TD2584E:121a-5: zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod gti mug can gyi don byas /
T02TD2584E:121a-6: slar gzhi'i lha rnams la thim par bya zhing bklags na ring po mi thogs par chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur te /
T02TD2584E:121a-7: de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-8: de nas thun gtong bar 'dod na /
T02TD2584E:121a-9: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2584E:121a-10: bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs su rim pa nas rim par 'od zer gyi tshul du 'thon te /
T02TD2584E:121a-11: las kyi bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-12: de nas thun gnyis pa la bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs can de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs nas /
T02TD2584E:121a-13: 'od zer gyi tshul du rim pa nas rim par gzhi la thim ste /
T02TD2584E:121a-14: de nas ci rigs pa ru mchod bstod byas la don gsum po gang yang rung ba cig la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-15: de nas yang gtong bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa lta bur bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-16: de nas thun gsum pa la sngon du bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
T02TD2584E:121a-17: thun tha ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de aom manydzu shr'i badzra mu: zhes mdun gyi nam mkha' la phye nas bzhugs pa de la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02TD2584E:121a-18: bshags pa byas la gshegs su gsol /
T02TD2584E:121a-19: bskyed pa'i mtshan rnams bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
T02TD2584E:121a-20: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan par byas te ci bde bar spyod lam bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-21: rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2584E:121a-22: 'bad nas thun gsum dag gis ni //
T02TD2584E:121a-23: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa na //
T02TD2584E:121a-24: nges par chos kyi rgyal po thob //
T02TD2584E:121a-25: ces le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:121a-27: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
T02TD2584E:121a-29: de ltar rnal 'byor pas zla ba gsum mam /
T02TD2584E:121a-31: 'on te dus rgyun du ma chad par bsgoms na don gyi rtags sam lha'i snang ba gsal ba dang /
T02TD2584E:121a-32: gzod bsnyen pa'i las la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121a-33: de nas snang ba mtha' yas la me tog phog ste /
T02TD2584E:121b-0: de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i gnas @121b yid dang 'thad pa ru /
T02TD2584E:121b-1: yo byad la sogs pa tshul bzhin bshams la /
T02TD2584E:121b-3: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad rdzogs par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:121b-4: gtso bo'i gnas su hr'i: las ni /
T02TD2584E:121b-6: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2584E:121b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la gzod dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms te /
T02TD2584E:121b-8: snang pa mtha' yas kyi thugs ka ru dang po'i sangs rgyas de'i lte ba la rdo rje rnon po de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:/
T02TD2584E:121b-9: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-10: rdo rje rnon po snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-11: gtso bo snang ba mtha' yas snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-12: gdan dang gzhal yas khang snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-13: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-15: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-16: ye shes kyi rdo rje sgo drug nas 'thon nas zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-17: sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas /
T02TD2584E:121b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:121b-20: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas rdo rje'i sgo drug nas tshur rim pa rim par hr'i: la thim ste /
T02TD2584E:121b-21: hr'i:'i byin rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te ;
T02TD2584E:121b-22: de la yang gong ma ltar spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:121b-23: de la spro bsdu byas te /
T02TD2584E:121b-24: sngags ring brjod pas lha nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te /
T02TD2584E:121b-25: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun 'khor lo brgyad la drug drug lha rnams kyi phyogs bzhi la nga lnga nga lnga shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121b-26: de yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ste ;
T02TD2584E:121b-27: rigs chung gi dbye bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2584E:121b-28: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02TD2584E:121b-30: chos kyi dbyings dang lngar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:121b-31: de nas las rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2584E:121b-32: ye shes sems dpa' sgrub pa dang /
T02TD2584E:121b-33: bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:121b-34: bsnyen pa rgyas pa byed na /
T02TD2584E:121b-35: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02TD2584E:121b-37: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02TD2584E:121b-38: zhes pa'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu zhe gnyis brjod pa /
T02TD2584E:122a-0: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i hr'i: las mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa @122a * //
T02TD2584E:122a-1: lnga byung la 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin du 'phros pas las gnyis byas 'dod chags can gyi rgyud sbyangs te /
T02TD2584E:122a-2: slar bzhi po la thim pas bde zhing gsal bar bltas la bklag go / de nas thun mtshams la sogs pa gong dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:122a-3: de nas mi bskyod pa la me tog phog nas de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2584E:122a-4: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02TD2584E:122a-5: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad sngon du bstan pa bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2584E:122a-6: h'um gi yi ge las bskyed pa'i//
T02TD2584E:122a-8: spro dang bsdu pa sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2584E:122a-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas te /
T02TD2584E:122a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02TD2584E:122a-11: gtso bo mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:122a-12: de'i steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:122a-13: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:122a-14: de'i lte ba la rdo rje ral gri /
T02TD2584E:122a-15: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:122a-16: de'i lte ba la yi ge h'um bsgoms te /
T02TD2584E:122a-17: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:122a-18: rdo rje ral gri snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:122a-19: dang po'i sangs rgyas snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:122a-20: de nas gtso bo mi bskyod pa /
T02TD2584E:122a-22: de nas rdo rje rgya gram /
T02TD2584E:122a-25: de nas ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
T02TD2584E:122a-26: zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:122a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02TD2584E:122a-29: rdo rje'i drug nas rim pa rim pas h'um la thim /
T02TD2584E:122a-30: h'um gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge lnga bcu rtsa gnyis rang rang gi gnas su gyur to //
T02TD2584E:122a-31: de las spro bsdus pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:122a-32: de spro bsdus sngags ring brjod pas lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur te /
T02TD2584E:122a-33: pho brang gi dbus su bdun /
T02TD2584E:122a-35: phyogs bzhir lha snam la bcu bzhi bcu bzhi dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:122a-36: de yang me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i don du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:122a-37: de nas las bcol ba dang bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:122b-1: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu dang /
T02TD2584E:122b-2: rkang pa gcig lhag pa brjod pas snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa 'phros 'dus pas zhe sdang can gyi rgyud sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2584E:122b-3: thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:122b-4: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la me tog phog nas de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD2584E:122b-5: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02TD2584E:122b-6: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad sngon bzhin byas la /
T02TD2584E:122b-7: de bzhin 'khor lo'i dbus nyid du //
T02TD2584E:122b-9: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2584E:122b-10: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2584E:122b-11: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02TD2584E:122b-12: rnam snang gi thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:122b-13: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:122b-14: de'i lte ba la shes rab ye shes //
T02TD2584E:122b-15: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge aa /
T02TD2584E:122b-16: de 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:122b-17: de nas shes rab ye shes /
T02TD2584E:122b-19: de nas dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:122b-20: de nas gtso bo rnam snang /
T02TD2584E:122b-22: de nas rdo rje rgya gram /
T02TD2584E:122b-25: de nas ye shes kyi sgo rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
T02TD2584E:122b-26: zhing khams drug snang bar byas las gnyis byas /
T02TD2584E:122b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:122b-28: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2584E:122b-29: rdo rje'i sgo drug nas rim pa rim par aa la thim ste /
T02TD2584E:122b-30: aa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge brgya bzhi bcu zhe bzhi rang gi gnas su spros la de 'dus pa las phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:122b-31: de spro bsdu bya zhing sngags ring brjod pas lha bzhi bcu zhe bzhir gyur to //
T02TD2584E:122b-32: de yang pho brang gi dbus su lnga /
T02TD2584E:122b-33: 'khor lo brgyad la bzhi bzhi phyogs bzhir lha snam la so drug so drug go / de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi me long la sogs pa'i don du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:122b-34: de nas las bcol nas bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:122b-36: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2584E:122b-38: rdo rje lcags kyu zhabs spa che //
T02TD2584E:123a-1: bar du tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lngar tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las yi ge brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'phros pas rnam snang mang por gyur te /
T02TD2584E:123a-2: zhing khams thams cad snang zhing las gnyis byas gti mug can gyi don byas te slar gzhi'i lha rnams la thim par bya zhing bklag go / thun mtshams ni gong ma dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:123a-3: de nas don yod grub pa la me tog phog nas de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2584E:123a-4: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02TD2584E:123a-5: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02TD2584E:123a-6: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad sngon bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2584E:123a-7: de bzhin 'khor lo'i dbus nyid du /
T02TD2584E:123a-9: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2584E:123a-10: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2584E:123a-11: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms te ;
T02TD2584E:123a-12: gtso bo don yod grub pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:123a-13: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo de'i lte ba la ye shes kyi sku can /
T02TD2584E:123a-14: de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba de'i steng du yi ge aa /
T02TD2584E:123a-15: de las 'phros pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:123a-16: ye shes sku can shes rab 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:123a-18: gtso bo don yod grub pa /
T02TD2584E:123a-20: rdo rje rgya gram chos 'byung mchod rten /
T02TD2584E:123a-21: de nas ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon nas zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:123a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
