T02TD2584E:123a-24: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02TD2584E:123a-25: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od zer de rim pa rim par aa la thim pas /
T02TD2584E:123a-26: aa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur /
T02TD2584E:123a-27: de rang rang gnas su spros so //
T02TD2584E:123a-28: de la spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:123a-29: de nas spro bsdu byas te sngags ring brjod pas lha bdun cu rtsa bdun du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:123a-30: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun /
T02TD2584E:123a-31: phyogs bzhir 'khor lo la gnyis gnyis mtshams bzhir re re phyogs bzhi'i lha rnams la bcu dgu bcu dgu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:123b-0: de yang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes me long lta bu la sogs pa shes par @123b bya'o //
T02TD2584E:123b-1: de nas las bcol ba nas bsnyen po 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:123b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02TD2584E:123b-5: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa'i bar gyis tshigs bcad bco lnga brjod pas yi ge dgu bcu rtsa lngar gyur te /
T02TD2584E:123b-6: don yod grub pas don gnyis byas /
T02TD2584E:123b-7: le lo can gyi rgyud sbyangs nas slar rim gyis gzhi la thim par bya zhing bzlas so //
T02TD2584E:123b-8: thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:123b-9: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan la me tog phog nas de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la /
T02TD2584E:123b-11: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad sngon bzhin byas la /
T02TD2584E:123b-12: de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas /
T02TD2584E:123b-13: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
T02TD2584E:123b-14: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2584E:123b-15: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02TD2584E:123b-16: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:123b-17: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo //
T02TD2584E:123b-18: de'i lte ba la ngag gi dbang phyug / de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:123b-19: de'i lte ba la yi ge aa /
T02TD2584E:123b-20: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
T02TD2584E:123b-21: ngag gi dbang phyug shes rab 'khor lo /
T02TD2584E:123b-23: gtso bo gzhal yas khang rdo rje rgya gram /
T02TD2584E:123b-25: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas te /
T02TD2584E:123b-26: ye shes kyi rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon zhing khams drug snang bar byas don gnyis byas /
T02TD2584E:123b-27: bde bar gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:123b-28: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02TD2584E:123b-29: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od zer de slar rim pa rim pas aa la thim pas aa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang rang gi gnas su spros te /
T02TD2584E:123b-30: de spros bsdus pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:123b-31: de nas spro bsdu byas nas sngags ring brjod pas lha brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i ngo bor gyur te /
T02TD2584E:123b-32: pho brang gi dbus su bzhi /
T02TD2584E:123b-34: phyogs bzhi'i lha snam la nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig 'di dag kun la lha mo brgyad brgyad /
T02TD2584E:124a-1: kun la bkod par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:124a-2: rigs kha phral gyi dkyil 'khor lnga bo 'di ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sgo rkyang pa re las med do //
T02TD2584E:124a-3: de nas las bcol ba dang /
T02TD2584E:124a-4: bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:124a-6: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste /
T02TD2584E:124a-8: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas sngags kyi yi ge brgya rtsa bzhi byung ste /
T02TD2584E:124a-9: rin chen 'byung ldan mang po gyur te /
T02TD2584E:124a-10: las gnyis byas nas ser sna can gyi rgyud sbyangs te /
T02TD2584E:124a-11: slar rim gyis gzhi bo la thim mo //
T02TD2584E:124a-12: thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:124a-13: de rnams ni rigs kha phral ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2584E:124a-14: de nas rigs bsdus pa byang sems rdo rje byed par 'dod na yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams la /
T02TD2584E:124a-16: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02TD2584E:124a-17: sna tshogs rdo rje yan chad sngon bzhin bsgoms la /
T02TD2584E:124a-18: de'i lte ba la yi ge bhr'um las gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang /
T02TD2584E:124a-19: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa /
T02TD2584E:124a-20: dbus na dkyil 'khor sgo rkyang pa lnga yod pa lha'i snam bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2584E:124a-22: rgyan thams cad phyi'i sgo la brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:124a-23: dkyil 'khor drug po de la ji ltar gsungs pa'i gdan thams cad bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:124a-24: de'i dbus su sa las seng ge'i khri /
T02TD2584E:124a-25: de'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma /
T02TD2584E:124a-26: de'i steng du aa dkar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje /
T02TD2584E:124a-27: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje sku mdog dkar po gzhon nu'i tshul can dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2584E:124a-28: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa bskyed la /
T02TD2584E:124a-29: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:124a-30: de'i steng du dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD2584E:124a-31: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la yi ge 'bru dgu la bdun la re re /
T02TD2584E:124a-33: phreng ba'i yi ge rnams gzhan dang mthun /
T02TD2584E:124a-34: de'i lte ba la aa las bskyed pa'i aa ra pa tsa na mdog dkar pa de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:124a-35: de'i steng na yi ge aa dkar po de las 'od kha dog rnam pa drug dang ldan par byung ste /
T02TD2584E:124b-0: 'od des mi shes pa'i @124b ri bo bcom nas rang gi lus nyid snang bar byed pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:124b-1: snang bar gyur ma thag tu rim pa nas 'od rim par gsal bar byas te /
T02TD2584E:124b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas so /
T02TD2584E:124b-3: de nas rdo rje'i sgo drug nas kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i 'od de byung ste /
T02TD2584E:124b-4: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par byas nas /
T02TD2584E:124b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams gsal bar gyur to //
T02TD2584E:124b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:124b-8: thugs dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
T02TD2584E:124b-9: shes rab dang ye shes bkug nas rim pa nas rim par thim ste /
T02TD2584E:124b-10: snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sngags dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas de nyid brtan par yang dang yang du bsgom /
T02TD2584E:124b-11: de ltar bsgoms pas phyir ring por mi thogs pas ye shes kyi sgo nas sku dang /
T02TD2584E:124b-13: zla ba'i sgo nas thugs dang gsum thob ste /
T02TD2584E:124b-14: sprul pa'i sku yang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:124b-15: de ltar sbyor ba dang po rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /
T02TD2584E:124b-16: gtso bo byang sems rdo rje'i thugs kar gdan zla ba la sogs pa drug gsal bar byas la /
T02TD2584E:124b-17: de'i aa las 'od 'phros pas rim pa nas rim par gsal bar byas te /
T02TD2584E:124b-18: don gnyis byas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
T02TD2584E:124b-19: slar rim pa nas rim par aa la thim pas /
T02TD2584E:124b-20: aa'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshan gyi yi ge lnga bcu rtsa gsum du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la spros so //
T02TD2584E:124b-21: de la spro pa dang bsdu ba byas nas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
T02TD2584E:124b-22: de nas yang spro bsdu byas nas sngags ring brjod pas lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi ngo bor gyur to //
T02TD2584E:124b-23: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho 'phrul gyis lha bzhi bcu rtsa bzhir sprul lo //
T02TD2584E:124b-24: de nas mi bskyod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su sprul lo //
T02TD2584E:124b-25: de nas snang ba mtha' yas kyi cho 'phrul gyis lha nyis brgya nyi shur sprul lo //
T02TD2584E:124b-26: de nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cho 'phrul gyis lha lnga bcu rtsa bzhir sprul lo ;
T02TD2584E:124b-27: / de nas don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis lha bdun cu rtsa drug tu sprul lo //
T02TD2584E:124b-28: spyir dkyil 'khor drug po 'di la mtshan brgyad brgya dang /
T02TD2584E:124b-30: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la mtshan sum cu so gsum phri bas lha ni bdun brgya bdun cu rtsa dgu'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-1: bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor la dgod na /
T02TD2584E:125a-2: dgod rgyu drug brgya sum cu so gsum mo //
T02TD2584E:125a-3: de'i lhag ma dbus su thim pa brgya bzhi bcu zhe drug yod pa la rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor du sum cu so bdun thim /
T02TD2584E:125a-5: snang ba mtha' yas su lnga bcu rtsa lnga /
T02TD2584E:125a-6: rin chen 'byung ldan du nyi shu tham pa /
T02TD2584E:125a-7: don yod grug par bcu dgu ste brgya bzhi bcu zhe drug go //
T02TD2584E:125a-8: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed dpa'i dus su rdo rje dbyings ni byang sems rdo rjes so //
T02TD2584E:125a-9: lhag ma ni rang rang gi cho 'phrul byas te /
T02TD2584E:125a-11: gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' bdag gi blo yis bsgyur bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-12: de ka la shes rab 'khor lo bdun 'gyur gyi gdams ngag ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-13: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms nas de nas las bcol ba dang bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
T02TD2584E:125a-14: rgyas par klog na sngags kyi tshig brjod pa dang mu khyud dang /
T02TD2584E:125a-15: 'khor lo kun la 'od byung nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur par spros te /
T02TD2584E:125a-16: mchod cing bskul la don byas nas slar 'dus te dkyil 'khor chen por rang gi gnas su bzhugs pa'am /
T02TD2584E:125a-17: mi lcogs na yig 'bru rnams la thim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-18: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2584E:125a-20: rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa che //
T02TD2584E:125a-21: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar rkang pa gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod nas /
T02TD2584E:125a-22: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las sgra yig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por gyur te zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod /
T02TD2584E:125a-23: gti mug can btul nas 'khor lo dang po'i yi ge la thim pa'am skur gnas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-24: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa nas /
T02TD2584E:125a-25: sgra dang ldan pa rnam skyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa brjod pas snga ma bzhin du khro bo spros te /
T02TD2584E:125a-26: zhe sdang can gtul nas 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125a-27: yang dag bdag med ces bya ba nas ye shes me lce'i bar du tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brjod pas yi ge nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga byung ste /
T02TD2584E:125a-28: 'od dpag tu med pas 'dod chags can btul nas 'khor lo gsum pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-1: rin chen tog gi bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas sngags kyi yi ge brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung nas nam mkha'i snying por gyur nas ser sna can btul nas 'khor lo bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba nas /
T02TD2584E:125b-3: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog gi bar du tshigs bcad bco lnga brjod pas yi ge dgu bcu rtsa lnga byung ste /
T02TD2584E:125b-4: don yod grub pas le lo can btul nas slar lnga bar gnas so //
T02TD2584E:125b-5: 'khor lo drug ni thams cad spyi'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-6: de nas mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i don bsdus pa'am bstod pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-7: sngags ni gong du bkod pa nyid do //
T02TD2584E:125b-8: de nas la sogs pa ni yi rang ba'i bstod pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-9: phan yon yang brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:125b-10: bdag dang gzhan spro ba bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-11: de nas thun mtshams ni gong dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:125b-12: de yan chad ni gong du bsnyen pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-13: de nas rdul tshon gyi cho ga'i rim pa bstan te /
T02TD2584E:125b-14: de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du //
T02TD2584E:125b-15: zhes pa ni lha khang ngam /
T02TD2584E:125b-19: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:125b-20: de ka la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-21: sa de yongs su gzhung bzhin sbyang /
T02TD2584E:125b-22: gzung dang ldan pas gzhung bzhin du bya pa'i bye brag gzhan na'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-23: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:125b-25: zla re 'am lo re nyid du ji ltar mos pa dga' bar bsgrub cing /
T02TD2584E:125b-26: zla ba yar ngo la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-27: de la rgyal pos khru brgya'am /
T02TD2584E:125b-29: blon po dang blon po chen po rnams kyis khru ni lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-30: ded dpon nam tshong dpon rnams kyis khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'am de'i phyed do //
T02TD2584E:125b-31: sgrub pa po rnams kyis khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa'am ci nus pa bya'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-32: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su /
T02TD2584E:125b-33: mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyis bgegs nye bar bzlog la /
T02TD2584E:125b-34: bdag dang slob ma la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2584E:125b-35: de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:125b-37: khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la /
T02TD2584E:126a-0: dri zhim po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar bkang @126a * //
T02TD2584E:126a-2: rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02TD2584E:126a-3: kun tu brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa //
T02TD2584E:126a-4: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
T02TD2584E:126a-5: sgo bzhi dang skar khung can la sogs pas yongs su bskor la /
T02TD2584E:126a-6: mtha' ma rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan mang po gzugs pa dang /
T02TD2584E:126a-7: bla re dam pa bres pa dang /
T02TD2584E:126a-8: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris nye bar mdzes par byas la //
T02TD2584E:126a-9: ba'i lci bas yang dag par sbyangs shing dris nye bar byug pa dang /
T02TD2584E:126a-10: mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag la /
T02TD2584E:126a-11: me tog dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la lag pa sa la bzhag ste h'um bzhi dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:126a-12: de nas khrus dang dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2584E:126a-14: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02TD2584E:126a-15: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te /
T02TD2584E:126a-16: zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyi ma'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba'am /
T02TD2584E:126a-17: yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'am //
T02TD2584E:126a-18: de bzhin du tshe brgyad dang /
T02TD2584E:126a-20: bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams nas brtsams la nya'i bar du'am /
T02TD2584E:126a-21: snga dro'i dus su brtsams par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:126a-22: de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su gnas la /
T02TD2584E:126a-23: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2584E:126a-24: sems dpa'i skyil krung du 'dug la /
T02TD2584E:126a-25: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2584E:126a-26: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2584E:126a-27: dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la snying po bzla ste /
T02TD2584E:126a-28: de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2584E:126a-29: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2584E:126a-30: rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug pa ni //
T02TD2584E:126a-31: dam tshig chen po gsum bya'o //
T02TD2584E:126a-32: rgyal ba'i gsang sngags sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2584E:126a-33: dngos grub mchog ni thams cad kyis //
T02TD2584E:126a-34: rdo rje dril bu rab tu bskul //
T02TD2584E:126a-35: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang //
T02TD2584E:126b-0: de yang dang po sa'i @126b lha mo yi ge bam las byung ba /
T02TD2584E:126b-1: lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la //
T02TD2584E:126b-3: me tog la sogs pas mchod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:126b-4: de la phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:126b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la /
T02TD2584E:126b-6: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2584E:126b-7: sngags la takki h'um dza: dza: de nas 'dis bskul /
T02TD2584E:126b-8: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2584E:126b-9: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las //
T02TD2584E:126b-10: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2584E:126b-11: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2584E:126b-12: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2584E:126b-13: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD2584E:126b-14: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi ste //
T02TD2584E:126b-15: bcom par bya ste dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2584E:126b-17: de nas de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams la //
T02TD2584E:126b-18: de'i steng du rdo rje bcings pa kha thur du bstan te bcings la gzhag go //
T02TD2584E:126b-21: de nas rdo rje bcings pa las byung ba'i h'um 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis sa gzhi gtags pa la thug gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par bsams la //
T02TD2584E:126b-24: de ni sa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:126b-25: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams sngon du bstan pa bzhin bya ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2584E:126b-26: mchod pa'i bye brag me tog la sogs pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas tshang bar dgram zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:126b-27: spro ba'i sems ni rab bskyed de //
T02TD2584E:126b-28: zhes pa'i don ni lce lag byin gyis brlabs pa nas //
T02TD2584E:126b-29: sbyor ba'i dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2584E:126b-30: las rgyal mchog dang rdo rje sgrub pa dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang //
T02TD2584E:126b-31: bstod pa la sogs pa yan chad bya'o //
T02TD2584E:126b-32: tshig ldan phyag byas spos thogs te //
T02TD2584E:126b-33: bstod de langs la 'gying bcas pas //
T02TD2584E:126b-34: bgegs bsal don du rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:126b-35: de nas phur bus gdab par bya //
T02TD2584E:126b-36: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:126b-37: de nas don dang ldan pas lus dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02TD2584E:126b-38: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te /
T02TD2584E:126b-39: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs kyis legs par bklubs la /
T02TD2584E:126b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la thal mo sbyar nas bung zad btud la //
T02TD2584E:127a-0: dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir @127a * //
T02TD2584E:127a-1: gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:127a-2: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bdun gyis bstod la de nas 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:127a-3: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis //
T02TD2584E:127a-4: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis //
T02TD2584E:127a-5: theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis //
T02TD2584E:127a-6: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02TD2584E:127a-7: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:127a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02TD2584E:127a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi //
T02TD2584E:127a-10: cho ga 'di ni bshad par gsol //
T02TD2584E:127a-11: de nas 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127a-12: deng ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2584E:127a-14: lha dang dam tshig mnyam par ni //
T02TD2584E:127a-15: gyur pas bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2584E:127a-16: byang chub sems dang sems gcig par //
T02TD2584E:127a-17: mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02TD2584E:127a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2584E:127a-19: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2584E:127a-20: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2584E:127a-21: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2584E:127a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2584E:127a-23: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2584E:127a-24: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la //
T02TD2584E:127a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127a-27: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2584E:127a-28: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:127a-29: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2584E:127a-30: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2584E:127a-31: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2584E:127a-32: dngos grub 'dir ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2584E:127a-34: sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo'i steng du nam mkha' la bzhag ste //
T02TD2584E:127a-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la //
T02TD2584E:127a-36: rkang ba'i mthil nas yongs su bzung ba nas //
T02TD2584E:127a-37: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2584E:127a-38: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos pa dang /
T02TD2584E:127a-39: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te bskor la sna tshogs rdo rje de dag sa la 'dri zhing //
T02TD2584E:127a-40: h'um 'don zhing bgegs thams cad skrod pa la sogs pa bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127a-42: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2584E:127a-43: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2584E:127a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas //
T02TD2584E:127a-45: bsgyings pa'i tshol gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2584E:127b-0: sngags pa rdo rje @127b sems zlos shig / rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02TD2584E:127b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi char //
T02TD2584E:127b-2: nyes par ldan pa'ang dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:127b-4: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis phyag rgyas snying ga dang /
T02TD2584E:127b-7: spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2584E:127b-8: g-yas pa khro bo'i rdo rje chen po gsor zhing //
T02TD2584E:127b-9: g-yon pa dril bu gsil zhing //
T02TD2584E:127b-10: khro bas 'bar ba'i lus dang bskor ba lan gsum byas la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127b-11: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2584E:127b-12: sems can thams cad ye shes bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir dpal gsang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nga 'dri yis //
T02TD2584E:127b-13: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2584E:127b-24: rig sngags 'chang grub pa rgan po dang rgan mo 'khor dang g-yog tu bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gags par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127b-25: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127b-26: de nas lha mo la sogs pa de rnams sa de spangs nas song bar bsams la //
T02TD2584E:127b-27: de nas sngon du song ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo yang rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:127b-28: de nas phur bus gdab pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:127b-29: sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyis seng ldeng gi phur bu tsandan dmar pos byugs la //
T02TD2584E:127b-31: me tog dmar po bcings la stod khro bo'i dbyibs la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa h'um bzhi las bskyed do //
T02TD2584E:127b-32: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighnam bandha bandha h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:127b-33: ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mtha' yas dang /
T02TD2584E:127b-36: gsus po che dang rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang ldan par gyur te /
T02TD2584E:127b-37: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
T02TD2584E:127b-38: g-yas pa rdo rje thob blangs la /
T02TD2584E:127b-41: pi tsu rna ya badzra mungga ra h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:127b-42: ces rdo rje tho ba la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2584E:128a-1: bzhi dbus dang lngar gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128a-2: de la go cha la sogs pa bskon par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:128a-4: de nas til nag dang mi rus kyi sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128a-5: de yan chad ni bgegs bzlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2584E:128a-6: de nas lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:128a-7: badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la //
T02TD2584E:128a-8: gur gum dang aa ka ru dang /
T02TD2584E:128a-11: gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi sngags kyis btab la /
T02TD2584E:128a-12: lha rnams kyi rnam grangs ji snyed pa'i dri'i thig le bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128a-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags te /
T02TD2584E:128a-14: dkyil 'khor de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad chen po yongs su gyur nas rje btsun 'jam dpal du gyur pa la sogs pa rang gi snying pos gzhug la /
T02TD2584E:128a-15: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod do //
T02TD2584E:128a-16: de ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:128a-17: de nas bum pa lhag par gnas par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:128a-18: dbang bskur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngags kyis mngon par gdab po //
T02TD2584E:128a-19: de'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:128a-20: bhr'um las rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa //
T02TD2584E:128a-21: rtsa ba nag nog med pa //
T02TD2584E:128a-22: lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba //
T02TD2584E:128a-24: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i padma //
T02TD2584E:128a-25: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02TD2584E:128a-26: der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tshig gi gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2584E:128a-27: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chus yongs su gang bar bsams nas //
T02TD2584E:128a-28: sman lnga dang rin po che lnga dang ldan pa me tog phreng bas bcings pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje snying po can la mgul pa gos gtsang mas dkris la /
T02TD2584E:128a-29: aa mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha brgyan par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags kyis mngon par bzlas zhing //
T02TD2584E:128a-30: aom badzrod ka h'um h'um zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD2584E:128a-31: spos la sogs pas mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bskor te /
T02TD2584E:128a-32: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar bzhag la //
T02TD2584E:128a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi nyin mo dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas brjod byas te nges dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-0: seng gri bya kri ka rni ka / ha sa de ba autpa @128b la ;
T02TD2584E:128b-1: sman rnams kun zhes pa la lnga po 'di dag zhes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-2: 'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u //
T02TD2584E:128b-3: nas til lnga la 'bru rnams kun //
T02TD2584E:128b-4: zhes pa las rnams kun la 'di dag gzung ngo //
T02TD2584E:128b-5: byi rus le sbram dang dung //
T02TD2584E:128b-6: mu tig dang ni ror bu ste /
T02TD2584E:128b-7: rin po che kun zhes pa la lnga po 'di dag zhes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-8: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas las thams cad pa'i bum pa la mngon par bsngags la //
T02TD2584E:128b-9: de bzhin du me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de dkyil 'khyil 'khor gyi sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-10: de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:128b-13: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a ya h'um /
T02TD2584E:128b-14: a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na badzra bidya r'a dza h'um phat /
T02TD2584E:128b-16: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2584E:128b-17: mthe chung rtse mo mdud byas la /
T02TD2584E:128b-18: mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng ba dag //
T02TD2584E:128b-19: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-21: de nas gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:128b-22: ji srid dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa de srid du 'dir 'dug pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlog tu gsol zhes bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-23: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye rig bya ste /
T02TD2584E:128b-24: de yan chad ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-25: de nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:128b-26: dad cing gus pas phyag byas nas slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:128b-27: de la re zhig slob ma rnams khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma gon la lag tu me tog thogs la slob dpon la phyag byas te /
T02TD2584E:128b-29: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2584E:128b-30: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-31: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul ston pa //
T02TD2584E:128b-32: mgon po chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-33: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-34: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-35: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2584E:128b-36: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-37: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2584E:128b-38: mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par gsol //
T02TD2584E:128b-39: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste /
T02TD2584E:128b-40: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2584E:128b-41: ho badzra siddha ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2584E:128b-42: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de'i spyi bor lag pa bzhag la //
T02TD2584E:128b-43: rdo rje las kyi snying po brjod nas sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:129a-0: de nas h'um badzra raksha zhes bya bas go @129a * //
T02TD2584E:129a-2: rkang ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du go bskon par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:129a-3: de nas rdo rje dris lag pa dri byin //
T02TD2584E:129a-5: bdug pas bdug pa dbul te /
T02TD2584E:129a-6: mar mes mar me nye bar bstan la /
T02TD2584E:129a-7: re re zhing 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:129a-8: deng nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad ldan par gyur pas nye bar gnas par gyis shig / de nas slob ma'i gtso bo la bos te /
T02TD2584E:129a-11: phyi ma'i don du gnyer ba'i bu //
T02TD2584E:129a-12: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te /
T02TD2584E:129a-13: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2584E:129a-14: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di //
T02TD2584E:129a-15: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2584E:129a-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2584E:129a-17: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2584E:129a-18: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD2584E:129a-19: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi /
T02TD2584E:129a-20: cho ga zab mo 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2584E:129a-21: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2584E:129a-22: thams cad mkhyen pas mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD2584E:129a-23: gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de //
T02TD2584E:129a-24: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2584E:129a-25: bdud se shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2584E:129a-26: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2584E:129a-27: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'o phyir //
T02TD2584E:129a-28: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2584E:129a-29: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan par nyon //
T02TD2584E:129a-30: brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD2584E:129a-31: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2584E:129a-32: de nas cho ga 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2584E:129a-34: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2584E:129a-36: rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2584E:129a-38: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2584E:129a-40: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2584E:129a-41: rig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:129a-42: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2584E:129a-43: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang //
T02TD2584E:129a-44: snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med pa'i so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02TD2584E:129b-0: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom @129b ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus par rtogs pa'i bsod nams thams cad mkhyen zhing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2584E:129b-1: gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na /
T02TD2584E:129b-2: chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ba de dag la bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2584E:129b-3: gang yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la nan tan du lhur mdzad pa de rnams la sems can gyi khams ji srid gnas pa de srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gnyis sam gsum brjod do //
T02TD2584E:129b-4: de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma slob dpon du 'os pa yongs su bzung la khas len par bya ba'i phyir bzhin bzangs smros shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:129b-5: slob mas kyang 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:129b-6: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2584E:129b-7: slob dpon bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02TD2584E:129b-8: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2584E:129b-9: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2584E:129b-10: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2584E:129b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi brtul zhugs che //
T02TD2584E:129b-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2584E:129b-13: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:129b-14: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2584E:129b-15: slob dpon nyid ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:129b-16: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2584E:129b-17: slob dpon dag ni dag bgyid do //
T02TD2584E:129b-18: rin chen rigs mchog yid 'ong ba'i //
T02TD2584E:129b-19: dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:129b-20: padma'i rigs ni dag pa dang //
T02TD2584E:129b-21: de bzhin las kyi rigs chen du //
T02TD2584E:129b-22: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2584E:129b-23: mgon pos dam tshig bdag la stsol ;
T02TD2584E:129b-24: ; zhes lan gnyis lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2584E:129b-25: de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:129b-26: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol//
T02TD2584E:129b-27: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02TD2584E:130a-0: don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs @130a * //
T02TD2584E:130a-2: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas //
T02TD2584E:130a-3: byang chub snying po la gnas kyi bar du //
T02TD2584E:130a-4: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2584E:130a-5: yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa'i de bzhin bla med byang chub sems //
T02TD2584E:130a-6: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-7: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2584E:130a-8: sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2584E:130a-9: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /
T02TD2584E:130a-10: sems can don yod tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2584E:130a-11: de dag brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2584E:130a-13: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2584E:130a-14: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-15: nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo //
T02TD2584E:130a-16: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2584E:130a-17: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2584E:130a-18: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-19: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-20: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2584E:130a-21: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2584E:130a-22: nyin re zhing yang lan drug tu //
T02TD2584E:130a-23: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2584E:130a-24: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2584E:130a-25: padma'i rigs mchog dam pa la //
T02TD2584E:130a-26: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2584E:130a-27: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-28: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2584E:130a-29: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2584E:130a-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-31: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-32: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2584E:130a-33: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2584E:130a-34: ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-35: ma grol bar ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:130a-36: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbung zhing //
T02TD2584E:130a-37: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2584E:130a-38: ces lan gnyis lan gsum du'o //
T02TD2584E:130a-40: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02TD2584E:130a-41: byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2584E:130a-42: bdag gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2584E:130a-43: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
T02TD2584E:130a-44: zhes pa 'dis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas la //
T02TD2584E:130a-45: 'dis smon lam 'debs su gzhug par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:130a-46: bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD2584E:130a-47: 'jig rten 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02TD2584E:130a-48: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las grol //
T02TD2584E:130a-50: de nas chos bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:130a-51: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2584E:130a-52: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2584E:130b-0: @130b khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02TD2584E:130b-1: rang byung skal pa chen po pa //
T02TD2584E:130b-2: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2584E:130b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:130b-4: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02TD2584E:130b-5: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02TD2584E:130b-6: zab po rtog ge thams cad kyis //
T02TD2584E:130b-7: rab tu mi rtog gnas med de //
T02TD2584E:130b-8: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02TD2584E:130b-9: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02TD2584E:130b-10: las dang bya ba sogs bral ba //
T02TD2584E:130b-11: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2584E:130b-12: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02TD2584E:130b-13: tshul la gnas pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:130b-14: de nas badzra ha sa ha zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i so shing gi rtse mor dris bskus shing me tog gis brgyan pa //
T02TD2584E:130b-15: shing mngar po 'o ma can las byung ba //
T02TD2584E:130b-16: tshad sor bcu gnyis pa 'cha' tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:130b-17: slob ma kha shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2584E:130b-18: mi smra bar ni so shing 'cha'/
T02TD2584E:130b-19: 'cha' ba zin nas mi las shing //
T02TD2584E:130b-20: phan tshun du yang mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2584E:130b-21: so shing mdun du drang por dor //
T02TD2584E:130b-22: de tshe bdag la lta ba dang /
T02TD2584E:130b-23: rtse mi gyen du bsgreng gyur na //
T02TD2584E:130b-24: de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya //
T02TD2584E:130b-25: de bzhin shar du kha bltas na //
T02TD2584E:130b-26: de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad //
T02TD2584E:130b-27: mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na /
T02TD2584E:130b-29: so shing bor ba brgya zhig la /
T02TD2584E:130b-30: gal te thur ru kha bltas na //
T02TD2584E:130b-31: de ni nges par sa 'og gi / dngos grub de la the tshom med //
T02TD2584E:130b-32: de nas nam zhes bya ba'i glu'i rdo rje yongs su bzlas pa'i chus 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir byin la /
T02TD2584E:130b-33: aom hr'i: bi shuddha shuddha sarba p'a pam ni ts'a sya sho dha ya //
T02TD2584E:130b-34: sarba bi kalpan aa pa na ya h'um zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas shing chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:130b-35: de nas ku sha gcig la /
T02TD2584E:130b-36: aom badzra t'i kashana dha'i: zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la byin la 'di lta mgo bo'i sngas su zhog cig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2584E:130b-37: yang ku sha gzhan dag la rdo rje gnod spyin gyi gsangs sngags mngon par bzlas pas stan du bya ba'i phyir sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:130b-38: rdo rje gnod sbyin mngon par bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa la yang yi ge brgya pa bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2584E:130b-39: dpung pa g-yon pa bsrung ba'i phyir dang brtan par bya ba'i phyir bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:130b-40: aom badzra yaksha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //
T02TD2584E:130b-41: aom manydzu shr'i sa ma ya //
T02TD2584E:131a-2: manydzu shr'i tve no pa tishtha dridho me bha ba /
T02TD2584E:131a-3: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2584E:131a-4: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2584E:131a-5: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2584E:131a-8: tsittam shri ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2584E:131a-10: bha ga w'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzr'a me mu nytsa manydzu shr'i badzri bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya manydzu shr'i a'a: zhes bya ba ni yi ge brgya ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2584E:131a-11: de nas bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig / sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2584E:131a-12: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smros shig ces brjod la slar btang ngo //
T02TD2584E:131a-13: de nas nang par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dag mthong bar dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:131a-14: rmi lam mthong nas rmi lam bzang po'am ngan pa 'dzem pa med par brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:131a-15: rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni //
T02TD2584E:131a-16: yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin //
T02TD2584E:131a-17: mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02TD2584E:131a-18: de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-19: dge slong dag las chos nyan tam //
T02TD2584E:131a-20: yang na gzhan las nyan kyang rung //
T02TD2584E:131a-21: chos ni rnam par spyod pa dang /
T02TD2584E:131a-22: de bzhin glegs bam glog pa dang /
T02TD2584E:131a-23: rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang /
T02TD2584E:131a-24: yang na dge slong gcig tu mthong //
T02TD2584E:131a-25: de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-26: yang na dge slong dngos por mthong //
T02TD2584E:131a-27: gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-28: de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong //
T02TD2584E:131a-29: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-30: de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-31: mdza' bo rnams pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD2584E:131a-32: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2584E:131a-33: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD2584E:131a-34: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-35: kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-36: 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-37: ri dang glang po che dag kyang //
T02TD2584E:131a-38: mthong na yang ni bzang bar grags //
T02TD2584E:131a-39: rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2584E:131a-40: bde gshegs spyod dang mthun pa yi //
T02TD2584E:131a-41: dga' thub can dang bram ze dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-42: phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-43: ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-44: seng ge dang ni ri dgas dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-45: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2584E:131a-46: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams //
T02TD2584E:131a-47: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-48: rin po che dang dngul dag dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-49: nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-50: mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131a-51: mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-0: 'bras bu @131b rnams dang me tog dang /
T02TD2584E:131b-1: rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-2: kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-3: byis pa dang ni gzhon nu ma //
T02TD2584E:131b-4: bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
T02TD2584E:131b-5: yang na thob cing reg smra dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-6: rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-8: dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-9: g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-10: gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-11: lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-12: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
T02TD2584E:131b-13: de bzhin ri dang khang thogs 'dzegs //
T02TD2584E:131b-14: ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
T02TD2584E:131b-15: yam shing me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2584E:131b-16: bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu las brgal zhing ro las brgal //
T02TD2584E:131b-17: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-18: stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2584E:131b-19: gyad stobs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-20: rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-21: de bzhin rtsal dang stobs 'gyed dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-22: bkra shis dag ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-23: mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
T02TD2584E:131b-24: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-25: dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang /
T02TD2584E:131b-26: sgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang /
T02TD2584E:131b-27: de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2584E:131b-28: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
T02TD2584E:131b-29: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2584E:131b-31: mi dge rnams ni mi 'grub po //
T02TD2584E:131b-32: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
T02TD2584E:131b-33: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
T02TD2584E:131b-34: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2584E:131b-35: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las /
T02TD2584E:131b-36: gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
T02TD2584E:131b-37: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
T02TD2584E:131b-38: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2584E:131b-39: ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2584E:131b-40: cho ga bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02TD2584E:131b-41: de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
T02TD2584E:131b-42: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
T02TD2584E:131b-43: rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:131b-44: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:131b-45: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa ji ltar bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2584E:131b-46: de nas bdug spos gtul la /
T02TD2584E:131b-47: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2584E:131b-48: sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-49: rdo rje rigs chen rigs dag dang //
T02TD2584E:131b-50: de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
T02TD2584E:132a-0: snying po sngags dang rigs rnams @132a * //
T02TD2584E:132a-2: gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
T02TD2584E:132a-3: chos kyi dbyings na nges bzhugs pa //
T02TD2584E:132a-4: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:132a-5: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2584E:132a-6: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:132a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2584E:132a-8: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02TD2584E:132a-9: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni bri bar bgyi //
T02TD2584E:132a-10: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2584E:132a-11: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2584E:132a-12: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la /
T02TD2584E:132a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang ba'i shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:132a-14: aom h'um hr'am hr'i: zhes bya ba'i dbus su steng dang 'og dang bar du bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:132a-16: yang steng du a'a: lnga dang /
T02TD2584E:132a-18: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132a-19: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132a-20: de yan chad ni slob ma lhag phar gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:132a-21: de nas nang par skya rengs shar tsam na khrus bya ba sngon du 'gro ba nas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2584E:132a-22: nyi ma shar kar thig gdab pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:132a-23: 'khor los sgyur ba'i nga rgyal bya la srad bu sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po dang dri zhim pos kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02TD2584E:132a-24: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba'i sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
T02TD2584E:132a-25: sa bon de rnams la rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar rang rang gi kha dog ji ltar 'od kyi srad bur bsams la mig gnyis su aom d'ipta drisht'a aam ku shi dza: zhes bkod la rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i rdzi ma'i lcags kyus drang bar bsam /
T02TD2584E:132a-26: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132a-27: bdag po rnams kyis btang ba'i 'od zer gyis rang rang gi srad bur gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2584E:132a-28: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dha rm'a: spha ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rm'a:/
T02TD2584E:132b-0: aa tyanta aa nu pra @132b bishta sarba dharm'a:/
T02TD2584E:132b-1: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bsam mo //
T02TD2584E:132b-2: de nas ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po snang ba mig gnyis su bskyed la /
T02TD2584E:132b-3: badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2584E:132b-4: gser la sogs pa'i snod du srad bu bzhag dri dang me tog pa sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD2584E:132b-5: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-6: ring thung ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis ldab bo //
T02TD2584E:132b-7: phra sbom ni sgo'i nyi shu cha'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-8: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:132b-9: slob dpon shar du bltas slob ma nub tu bltas la /
T02TD2584E:132b-10: lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu lte ba nas bzung la dza: zhes brjod la //
T02TD2584E:132b-11: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis grogs mchog la gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-12: grogs pos kyang dza: gsum gyis blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-13: de nas 'debs kar 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:132b-14: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD2584E:132b-15: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
T02TD2584E:132b-16: thams cad 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:132b-17: khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD2584E:132b-18: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de //
T02TD2584E:132b-19: ji ltar gzhan nas gsungs pa ltar gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-20: de yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni dbus su phur bu btsugs la de la srad bu btags te /
T02TD2584E:132b-21: dbus la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02TD2584E:132b-22: de'i phyir rim rtsibs bcu drug pa 'de'i phyi rim du rgyan med pa'i sgo gzhug ste /
T02TD2584E:132b-23: rtsig pa'i cha dang 'dod yon dang /
T02TD2584E:132b-24: dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-25: rta babs la sogs pa rgyan gzhan ni med par gdab bo //
T02TD2584E:132b-26: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje phreng bas bskor la /
T02TD2584E:132b-27: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug par gdab po //
T02TD2584E:132b-28: de'i phyi rol du phreng bas bskor la /
T02TD2584E:132b-29: gru chad bzhi yis brgyan te lha snam med pa'i go dang thig gdab po //
T02TD2584E:132b-30: de la rgyan la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan par gdab bo //
T02TD2584E:132b-32: 'khor lo rim gsum ldan pa la //
T02TD2584E:132b-33: snam bu mu khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2584E:132b-34: rta babs dang ni tva ra na /
T02TD2584E:132b-35: shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD2584E:132b-37: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:132b-38: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi thig bstan nas /
T02TD2584E:133a-1: thig 'debs na thams cad kyi dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02TD2584E:133a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gdab po //
T02TD2584E:133a-5: de nas rigs bsdus pa'i thig 'debs na dbus 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi po brang dang bcas par gdab po //
T02TD2584E:133a-6: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas /
T02TD2584E:133a-7: pho brang thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu ru yod pa la //
T02TD2584E:133a-8: rdo rje'i gdung bzhi btang la phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'khor dang bcas pa'i pho brang lnga bya gsung ngo //
T02TD2584E:133a-10: de nas mdun du mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2584E:133a-11: g-yas su rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:133a-12: rgyab tu snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2584E:133a-13: g-yon du don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab po //
T02TD2584E:133a-15: nang gi dkyil 'khor te dag kyang gru bzhi pa //
T02TD2584E:133a-18: phyi'i dkyil 'khor la ni rta babs la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-19: dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyi phyi rol du khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-20: de dag ni thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor de la gal te 'gran zhing gegs byed na de bzlog pa'i cho ga ni nam mkha' dri med las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-22: de nas tshon dgye ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:133a-23: srad bu la bshad pa'i kha dog gi rim pas tshon rtsi rnams blangs la /
T02TD2584E:133a-24: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba 'di rnams las bskyed de //
T02TD2584E:133a-25: rang gi rigs kyi 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2584E:133a-26: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2584E:133a-27: zhes bya ba 'di dag phyag rgya dang bcas pas stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-28: de la 'di'i phyag rgya 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:133a-29: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi //
T02TD2584E:133a-30: mdzub mo rtse mor rab sbyar nas //
T02TD2584E:133a-31: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02TD2584E:133a-32: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2584E:133a-33: mthar yi ge hr'i: dang rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas spar bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133a-34: de yang 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:133a-35: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren ma ni //
T02TD2584E:133a-36: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs //
T02TD2584E:133b-0: de la tshon mang por bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin @133b gyis brlab par byas te /
T02TD2584E:133b-1: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas rnams sems can rjes su dga' bas chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133b-2: de nas dbus kyi phur bu h'um bzhis phyung la /
T02TD2584E:133b-3: bu ga tshon sna lngas dgang ste /
T02TD2584E:133b-4: de nas tshon dkar po blangs la //
T02TD2584E:133b-5: aom badzra raksha sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de dbus su bkye la /
T02TD2584E:133b-6: de nas dbang ldan phyogs su song ste /
T02TD2584E:133b-7: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi rim par mnyam zhing rgyun ma chad par mdzub gang bar drang la des tshon rtsi bde bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133b-8: de yang drug stong ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i le'u dgu pa nas /
T02TD2584E:133b-9: rdo rje 'chang che pos 'di skad gsung te /
T02TD2584E:133b-10: kye ma 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2584E:133b-11: brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ni //
T02TD2584E:133b-12: rin chen lnga las grub pa ste /
T02TD2584E:133b-13: dbus kyi pho brang le tse rnams //
T02TD2584E:133b-14: shar phyogs bee d'urya las grub //
T02TD2584E:133b-15: lhor ni gser las grub pa ste /
T02TD2584E:133b-17: byang ni aindra n'i la ste /
T02TD2584E:133b-18: dbus ni dung las grub pa'o / zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2584E:133b-21: 'byor ba tha mas ni rin po che gser gyi sa gzhi la byin gyis brlabs te bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:133b-22: de yang cho ga bsdus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa //
T02TD2584E:133b-23: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02TD2584E:133b-24: lho ni ser po yin par nges //
T02TD2584E:133b-25: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02TD2584E:133b-26: byang du ljang gu yang dag bri //
T02TD2584E:133b-27: dbus kyi lte ba dkar po ste //
T02TD2584E:133b-28: gong ras rnams kyang de ka ltar //
T02TD2584E:133b-29: re mig rnams ni ljang gu ste //
T02TD2584E:133b-30: de yi phyi rgyab 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2584E:133b-33: gru chad ljang gu mtsho dang bcas //
T02TD2584E:133b-34: panytsa rin chen pha gu lnga //
T02TD2584E:133b-35: dkar dang ljang dang dmar dang ser //
T02TD2584E:133b-36: sngon po phyi yi rtse mo la'o /
T02TD2584E:133b-37: sgo ni phyogs kyi mdog dang sbyar //
T02TD2584E:133b-38: phyi rol 'khor lo bcu drug ni //
T02TD2584E:133b-41: phyi yi rtsig pa lnga po yang //
T02TD2584E:133b-42: pha gu lnga yi rim pa bzhin //
T02TD2584E:133b-43: khyams ni padma r'a ga'i mdog //
T02TD2584E:133b-44: dra ba'i rang bzhin mthong ga la /
T02TD2584E:133b-46: bkra shis bya yi tshogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD2584E:133b-47: rta babs la sogs ci mdzes par //
T02TD2584E:134a-0: @134a * // mkhas pas ji ltar 'tsham par bri //
T02TD2584E:134a-1: de ni tshon gyi rim pa ste //
T02TD2584E:134a-2: mi shes drang phyir kun rdzob bstan //
T02TD2584E:134a-3: don gyi ngo bo brjod du med //
T02TD2584E:134a-5: de la dpyad de bri ba ni //
T02TD2584E:134a-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshon no //
T02TD2584E:134a-7: de nas kha phral ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshon dgye na /
T02TD2584E:134a-9: dbus ni 'khor lo rdo rje dang /
T02TD2584E:134a-10: padma rin chen rgya gram mtshan //
T02TD2584E:134a-11: le tshe dgu la ka ba brgyad //
T02TD2584E:134a-12: thams cad la ni rab tu gsungs //
T02TD2584E:134a-13: rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2584E:134a-14: dbus dkar re mig ljang gu la //
T02TD2584E:134a-15: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dkar po dgye //
T02TD2584E:134a-16: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dkar po ste //
T02TD2584E:134a-17: rdo rje phreng dkar gzhi ma ser //
T02TD2584E:134a-18: shar sngo lho ni ser po la /
T02TD2584E:134a-19: nub ni dmar byang ljang gu'o //
T02TD2584E:134a-20: rtsig pa dkar nas rim par dgye //
T02TD2584E:134a-21: khyams la sogs pa spyi dang mthun //
T02TD2584E:134a-22: mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2584E:134a-23: dbus na sngo phreng dkar po la //
T02TD2584E:134a-24: 'khor lo sngon po re mig ljang //
T02TD2584E:134a-25: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dmar po gtang //
T02TD2584E:134a-26: rdo rje phreng nag gzhi ma dkar //
T02TD2584E:134a-27: shar dkar lho ni ser po la //
T02TD2584E:134a-28: nub dmar byang ni ljang gu'o //
T02TD2584E:134a-29: rtsig pa sngo nas rim pas dgye //
T02TD2584E:134a-30: khyams la sogs pa spyi dang mthun //
T02TD2584E:134a-32: dbus dmar phreng ba dkar po la /
T02TD2584E:134a-33: 'khor lo dmar la re mig ljang //
T02TD2584E:134a-34: rtsibs mchan rnams ni dkar por bya //
T02TD2584E:134a-35: rdo rje'i phreng ljang gzhi ma ser //
T02TD2584E:134a-36: shar sngo lho no ser po la /
T02TD2584E:134a-37: nub dkar byang ni ljang gu ste //
T02TD2584E:134a-38: rtsig pa dmar nas rim pas dgye //
T02TD2584E:134a-40: dbus ser phreng ba sngon po la /
T02TD2584E:134a-41: 'khor lo ser la re mig ljang //
T02TD2584E:134a-42: rtsibs mchan rnams ni sngon po la //
T02TD2584E:134a-43: rdo rje phreng dmar gzhi ma ljang //
T02TD2584E:134a-44: shar sngo lho ni ser po la /
T02TD2584E:134a-45: nub dmar byang ni ljang gu ste //
T02TD2584E:134a-46: rtsig pa ser nas rim pas dgye //
T02TD2584E:134a-47: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2584E:134a-48: dbus ljang phreng ba dmar po la //
T02TD2584E:134a-49: 'khor lo ljang la re mig ser //
T02TD2584E:134a-50: rtsibs mchan rnams ni ser po ste //
T02TD2584E:134a-51: rdo rje phreng sngo gzhi ma ser //
T02TD2584E:134a-52: shar sngo lho ni ser po la //
T02TD2584E:134a-53: nub dmar byang ni dkar po ste /
T02TD2584E:134a-54: rtsig pa ljang nas rnam par dgye //
T02TD2584E:134b-0: zhes pa ni khri drug stong pa'i @134b rgyud phyi ma nas gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:134b-1: khyams la sogs pa ni thams cad la ma thun no //
T02TD2584E:134b-2: de nas rigs bsdus pa'i rdul tshon dgye na /
T02TD2584E:134b-3: dbus ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar //
T02TD2584E:134b-4: lhag ma ni rang rang gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-5: phyi'i rgyan ni spyi dang mthun no //
T02TD2584E:134b-6: khor yug dang khor yug chen po ni dmar po dang dkar po byas la rdo rje ser po dang 'od kyi ra ba bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-7: de yan cad ni rdul tshon bri ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-8: de nas phyi rol du dri zhim pos nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2584E:134b-9: me tig gi sil ma gtor te /
T02TD2584E:134b-10: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2584E:134b-11: phyi dang nang du bcas pa kun la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02TD2584E:134b-13: aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-14: de nas phyi dro'i dus su glu dang rol mo dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed dang ci 'dod pa bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-15: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa la sa ma ya stvam zhes gnas su bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2584E:134b-16: de nas yi ge phyin ci ma log par kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba gsal bar snang la bzhugs pa'i lha rnams /
T02TD2584E:134b-17: aom h'um hr'i: zhes pa'i snying pos bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:134b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi thun mong yin no //
T02TD2584E:134b-19: de la phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-20: de la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02TD2584E:134b-21: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod ces pa la sogs pas bstod de /
T02TD2584E:134b-23: de nas rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams mgon po 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:134b-24: bum pa gzhan dag kyang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du //
T02TD2584E:134b-25: aom badzro da ka h'um zhes brgya rtsa bzlas la gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'bum ma ma khri 'am stong ngam brgya'am rigs so so la re re gzhag go //
T02TD2584E:134b-26: spyi la de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-0: de nas dkyil 'khor bas ha can mi ring mi nye bar bkur sti gus pa sngon du 'gro bas shar phyogs su yum shes rab @135a * //
T02TD2584E:135a-1: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya //
T02TD2584E:135a-2: lhor ni rin po che tog / nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa //
T02TD2584E:135a-3: byang du zla ba sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-4: gar mkhan dang rol mo la sogs pa'i ltad mo mang po yang phyogs bzhir byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2584E:135a-5: zur bzhi dar gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi yang bsgreng bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-6: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2584E:135a-7: dkar gsum dang mngar gsum dang khur ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa mang po yang ci rigs pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-9: ba dan drug dang rnga mas brgyan //
T02TD2584E:135a-10: dril bu dar mtshon rgyal mtshan sogs //
T02TD2584E:135a-11: de la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni //
T02TD2584E:135a-12: shin tu mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-13: zhes pa la sogs rgyan mchog ni //
T02TD2584E:135a-14: 'di yi skabs su rim pas bstan //
T02TD2584E:135a-15: zhes gsungs pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-16: de yan chad ni brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o//
T02TD2584E:135a-17: de nas dgongs mo'i dus su sngags pa khrus byas //
T02TD2584E:135a-18: rgyan cha bgo / lus la dri zhim pos byugs nas g-yas pas rdo rje thogs la /
T02TD2584E:135a-19: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing //
T02TD2584E:135a-20: mtshang ba'i lhag ma kha bskang ba'i phyir lan bdun nam lda 'am gsum du yi ge brgya pa bzla zhing bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135a-21: de nas bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02TD2584E:135a-22: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas bzung la /
T02TD2584E:135a-23: sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2584E:135a-26: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa yan chad byas la /
T02TD2584E:135a-27: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02TD2584E:135a-29: de bzhin gzhan dag gis mchod de //
T02TD2584E:135a-30: de bzhin du mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2584E:135a-31: de nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2584E:135a-32: ba dan sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam /
T02TD2584E:135a-33: 'byor pa ci yod pa las 'bul ba dang ro brgya ba'i lha'i zhal zas dang /
T02TD2584E:135a-34: svasti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba sna tshogs pa 'bum mam brgya stong snyed du dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:135a-35: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am aa'dya nutpanna tv'ata ces brjod la dbul bar bya'o//
T02TD2584E:135a-36: rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam //
T02TD2584E:135b-0: @135b bcu aom h'um hr'i: zhes pa mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-1: rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2584E:135b-2: gling bu dang pi wang dang /
T02TD2584E:135b-8: rnga rings dang rnga rked nyag dang gi mi la zhes bya ba dang bcu'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-10: stong ngam brgya dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-11: shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2584E:135b-12: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang /
T02TD2584E:135b-13: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-14: de nas sbyin sreg gis las phran tshegs kyi dngos grub sgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:135b-15: gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na //
T02TD2584E:135b-16: las bshad de dag gzhan du med //
T02TD2584E:135b-18: gzhan gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi don bsgom pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i sbyin sreg 'di yang bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:135b-19: las bshad ces pa ni las ni bdag dang gzhan gyi'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-20: bshad pa ni sgrub thabs 'di ru'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-22: don gzhan dang mi bsre par 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-23: bdag gi las dang gzhan gyi las //
T02TD2584E:135b-25: de la dang po la bdag don dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:135b-26: de la bdag gi las bstan pa //
T02TD2584E:135b-28: bdag gi las la yang bzhi ste /
T02TD2584E:135b-29: de yang phyi dang nang du snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa sbyang zhing zhi bar bya ba'i phyir na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dang tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par bya ba'i phyir rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2584E:135b-30: bsam pa yid dang 'thad pa thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir dbang gi sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD2584E:135b-31: phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa dang /
T02TD2584E:135b-32: sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad rgyun gcad par bya ba'i phyir drag po'i mngon spyod dang bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-33: de nas de'i yam shing la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:135b-34: shin tu dge ba'i shing bu ni //
T02TD2584E:135b-35: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba la dge ba ste /
T02TD2584E:135b-36: dkar po la 'o ma can mngar ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-37: rgyal pa la dge ba ste ser po kha ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-39: dmar ba skyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:135b-40: mngon spyod la dge ba ste /
T02TD2584E:135b-41: nag po tsher ma can gyi shing tsha zhing rtsub ba'i ro dang ldan pas bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:135b-42: de'i ngo bo gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2584E:136a-0: de bstan pa'i phyir tsandan shug pa zhes pa ni @136a * //
T02TD2584E:136a-2: sogs zhes pa'i khongs su rgyas pa la skyer pa /
T02TD2584E:136a-3: dbang la padma dmar po'i shing /
T02TD2584E:136a-4: mngon spyod la gang zhig tsher ma can gyi shing la bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:136a-5: dri zhim dang ldan mdzes pa'i shing //
T02TD2584E:136a-7: zhi la kha dog dkar po mngar ba'i ro yis byug pa'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-8: dbang la kha dog dmar po ro skyur bas byug pa'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-9: rgyas pa la kha dog ser po ro kha bas byug pa'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-10: mngon spyod la kha dog nag por bya zhing ro tsha zhing rtsub pas byug go zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:136a-11: de nas shing gi ring thung gi tshad bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:136a-12: zlum po la sogs dbyibs su brtsig / ces gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:136a-13: zhi ba'i thab khung ni kha dog dkar po dbyibs zlum po che chung ni khru gang du bya'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-14: zabs su khru phyed brkos la /
T02TD2584E:136a-15: kha khyer sor bzhis bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:136a-16: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje phreng ba gtang ngo //
T02TD2584E:136a-17: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo gtang ngo //
T02TD2584E:136a-18: de nas rgyas pa'i thab khung ni kha dog ser po //
T02TD2584E:136a-20: khru bzhi pa khru gang zabs su brko /
T02TD2584E:136a-21: kha la sor bzhi bcu yod pas gru bzhir bskor ro //
T02TD2584E:136a-22: dbus kyi kha khyer la rin po che'i phreng ba btang //
T02TD2584E:136a-23: nang du padma'i 'bras bu phyi rol gyi sor bzhi la padmas bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-24: de nas dbang gi thab khung ni dbyibs zla gam la /
T02TD2584E:136a-25: zla gam gyi kha la sor nyi shu tham pa yod pa //
T02TD2584E:136a-26: rgyal sor bzhi bcu yod pa //
T02TD2584E:136a-27: zabs su sor bcu bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:136a-29: kha khyer la sor gsum gyis bskor //
T02TD2584E:136a-30: dbus kyi kha khyer la mda' gzhu dang lcags kyu btang //
T02TD2584E:136a-31: de'i phyi rol du zhags pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-32: de nas mngon spyod kyi thab khung ni kha dog nag po /
T02TD2584E:136a-34: ngos re la sor nyi shu'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-36: sor gsum phyir bkyed la kha khyer sor gsum gyis bskor //
T02TD2584E:136a-37: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor /
T02TD2584E:136a-38: de'i phyi rgyab tu mda' gzhu dang /
T02TD2584E:136a-39: mdung rtse gsum pa dang dgra sta dang kha tv'am ga spel la gtang ngo //
T02TD2584E:136a-40: de la rang rang gi mtshan ma yang bri'o //
T02TD2584E:136a-41: de nas me spar ba ni zhi ba'i me ni dgon pa'am //
T02TD2584E:136b-0: 'on te gtsub shing las bton la dngul la sogs pa'i snod dkar po'i nang du rlung yab kyis @136b sbar la /
T02TD2584E:136b-2: gzod bud shing gi nang du blugs so //
T02TD2584E:136b-3: rgyas pa'i me ni rgyal po'am //
T02TD2584E:136b-4: 'on te bu mang po'i khyim nas blangs te /
T02TD2584E:136b-5: gser ram ser po'i snod sar par sbar ro //
T02TD2584E:136b-6: dbang gi me ni smad 'tshong ma'i khyim nas blangs la zangs kyi kong bu sar par sbar ro //
T02TD2584E:136b-7: mngon spyod kyi me ni shan pa nag po'i khyim nas blangs la lcags kong sar pa'i nang du rlung yab kyis sbar la /
T02TD2584E:136b-9: gzod bud shing gi nang du blugs so //
T02TD2584E:136b-10: de nas aom badzra dzva la dzva la h'um zhes brjod cing mar gyi dgang blugs gsum gyis me gso bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:136b-11: de nas thab khung de bsangs la /
T02TD2584E:136b-12: dam tshig gi me lha bskyed par bya ba'i phyir thab khung du me tog gtor la /
T02TD2584E:136b-13: pam las sna tshogs padma'i gdan bskyed la //
T02TD2584E:136b-15: dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2584E:136b-17: dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan //
T02TD2584E:136b-18: zhes pa'i bar ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:136b-19: de nas ye shes kyi me lha shar lho mtshams nas spyan drang ste /
T02TD2584E:136b-20: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02TD2584E:136b-21: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02TD2584E:136b-22: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2584E:136b-23: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:136b-24: aagna ye ram ram pra be sha ya phat /
T02TD2584E:136b-25: a'a be sha ya aa: zhes dam tshig dang gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02TD2584E:136b-26: de la mchod pas mchod nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2584E:136b-27: de nas dam tshig gi me lha'i thugs kar lha tshogs bskyed de //
T02TD2584E:136b-28: de yi thugs kar aa las zla stengs su //
T02TD2584E:136b-30: sku gsung thugs dang ldan par bsam //
T02TD2584E:136b-31: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
T02TD2584E:136b-32: de nas rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:136b-33: de la sreg blugs dbul ba ni /
T02TD2584E:136b-34: zhes gsungs pa ni gong du bskyed pa'i lha tshogs de la 'og nas 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:136b-35: mar dang til dang yam shing dang //
T02TD2584E:136b-36: mngar gsum lde gu dkar gsum ni //
T02TD2584E:136b-37: zhi ba'i rdzas la bshad pa'o //
T02TD2584E:136b-38: zhes gsungs pa ni zhi ba'i rdzas so //
T02TD2584E:136b-39: rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dgug / de las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD2584E:137a-2: / rgyas par bstan te der shes bya //
T02TD2584E:137a-3: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:137a-11: gro chan rnams bsog go zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:137a-12: de yang kha dog dang ro dang yam shing gi skabs su gsungs pa ltar 'dir yang ngo //
T02TD2584E:137a-13: rdzas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa'i g-yas su bsgrig par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-14: mchod rdzas thams cad ni g-yon du bsgrig par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-15: de nas dgang gzar blugs gzar kha sbyar zhing dbul ba ni zhi ba la mar //
T02TD2584E:137a-17: dbang la me tog autpa la /
T02TD2584E:137a-18: mngon spyod la tsher ma dbul te sna drang ba'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-19: dbul ba ni sngags rings kyi zhabs la //
T02TD2584E:137a-20: aom sarba p'a pam sh'antim ku ru ye sdig pa la sogs pa zhi bar gyur zhig sv'a h'a //
T02TD2584E:137a-21: pushtim ku ru ye tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par gyur zhig sv'a h'a /
T02TD2584E:137a-22: pa sham ku ru ye thams cad dbang du gyur cig sv'a h'a //
T02TD2584E:137a-23: m'a ra ya phat thams cad brlag par gyis shig / a'a karsha ya thams cad khugs par gyur zhig h'um dza: zhes brjod cing sreg rdzas rnams rim par dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-24: de nas spyi bor yi ge aa dkar po cig bsams la de'i 'od zer gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2584E:137a-28: zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams la phog pas ye shes kyi chus bkrus nas yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD2584E:137a-29: bkug nas bzhi po'i aa la thim pas 'od du zhu ste /
T02TD2584E:137a-30: lus mgo gzhug tu thim pas bag chags kyi lus sbyangs te /
T02TD2584E:137a-31: slar gsos nas mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan par gyur te /
T02TD2584E:137a-32: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo bde la mi rtog pa de la lhag par gnas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-33: de nas rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi bo'i aa las 'od zer ser po 'phros pas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i yang tshe bcud bsdus nas bdag gi tshe'i gnas su thim zhing rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137a-34: longs spyod 'phel bar 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams khengs pa'i nor phyugs bkug cing rang gi nor phyugs la bstims te rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137b-0: bu tsha 'phel bar 'dod tshangs @137b ris man chad kyi pho'i mtshan kun bkug ste /
T02TD2584E:137b-1: pho mo'i skye gnas la bstims pas bu tsha 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:137b-2: de nas dbang gi ting nge 'dzin ni yang aa las 'od dmar po 'phros pas gang dbang du bya ba de 'os zer gyis bkug ste /
T02TD2584E:137b-3: bag gi mdun du mngon sum du 'ongs shing dbang du 'dus par bsams na rgyal po'i btsun mo lta bu yang dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:137b-4: de nas drag po mngon spyod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni aa de las 'od zer nag po 'phros pas bdag gis dgra bgegs la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams bkug ste bsgral nas phung po mchod yon du phul te brlag par bsam pa de'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:137b-5: spyi bo zla stengs aa bsgoms la //
T02TD2584E:137b-6: de nyid zhu bar gyur pa las //
T02TD2584E:137b-7: zhi bya de nyid zhu 'gyur te //
T02TD2584E:137b-8: slar gsos gzhon nu'i gzugs byas la //
T02TD2584E:137b-9: de la lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD2584E:137b-10: zhes de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:137b-11: de yan cad ni bdag gi don gyi rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:137b-12: de nas na ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:137b-13: de la na ba'i las bya ba //
T02TD2584E:137b-14: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:137b-15: gang dag yid ni mi dran pa'i //
T02TD2584E:137b-20: bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod gyur na ;
T02TD2584E:137b-21: / zhes pa ni bgegs kyi rgyal po ba n'i ya ka la sogs pa bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD2584E:137b-22: sbyor ba ni rims dang shu ba dang g-yan pa dang /
T02TD2584E:137b-23: mdze la sogs pa yod na /
T02TD2584E:137b-27: zhes pa ni bdag stong ba'i ngang las yi ge dha'i: dkar po cig tu bsams la /
T02TD2584E:137b-28: de yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba lta bu de'i steng du gzhi'i snying po mum dang /
T02TD2584E:137b-29: spro byed kyi snying po ram bsam //
T02TD2584E:137b-30: ram de las 'od 'phros pas nad la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2584E:137b-31: de gtong bar byed pa'i bgegs dang /
T02TD2584E:137b-32: de'i rkyen la sogs pa rnams shin tu 'od zer gyis bzhu btul byas la slar nad la thim pas nang kyi dngos po thams cad zhu bar byas te slar 'dus pa las 'bru nag po las bgegs kyi gzugs byas la /
T02TD2584E:138a-1: gnod pa'i ming shog bu la bris te /
T02TD2584E:138a-2: glan la de la nad kyi dngos po bstims la /
T02TD2584E:138a-3: thim pa dang gzod zhi ba'i skabs su ji ltar gsungs pa ltar me sbar te /
T02TD2584E:138a-4: sngags rings zhabs la bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang nang bzhi brgya rta bzhi zhi bar 'gyur cig sv'a h'a zhes bzlas te yungs kar dang /
T02TD2584E:138a-5: til nag gis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par byas na sos par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:138a-6: dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom bya ste //
T02TD2584E:138a-8: yungs kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg / ces pa'i bar du gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:138a-9: gal te sems par ma gyur na //
T02TD2584E:138a-10: srin bus zos pa'i shing gdug pa can khru gang pa la tsha ba gsum gyis bskus te de la me spar la gong ma lta bur bgegs dang nad dgug gzhug byas la bsreg par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:138a-11: lhag ma ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:138a-12: na ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:138a-13: de nas shi ba la phan gdags pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:138a-14: de nas shi la phan gdags na //
T02TD2584E:138a-17: dang po gnod pa'i bgegs bsal te //
T02TD2584E:138a-19: rigs kyi bu pho mo don dang ldan pa gang rung cig tshe'i 'du byed du gyur na /
T02TD2584E:138a-20: phung po de drod dang ma bral bar bdag dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas ro la gnod pa'i bgegs la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyis bkug la //
T02TD2584E:138a-21: sha chang dang sgog btsong dang /
T02TD2584E:138a-24: khur ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma cha gcig gis byin gyis brlabs la bdud rtsi sbyin pa'i sngags kyis byin la rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2584E:138a-25: su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na //
T02TD2584E:138a-26: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD2584E:138a-27: gshin rje srin po gang yang rung //
T02TD2584E:138a-28: sngon gyi lan chags ded pa rnams //
T02TD2584E:138a-29: mthun pa'i gtor ma 'di long la //
T02TD2584E:138a-30: tshe 'das 'di la ma mnar cig / ces byas la gtang ngo //
T02TD2584E:138a-31: de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos bra ba cing sngags rings bzlas la mtshams bcad do //
T02TD2584E:138a-32: de ni phyi rol la phan pa'i cho ga zhes pa'o //
T02TD2584E:138a-33: de nas ro de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aa dkar po cig bsams la de 'od du zhu ba las lus thams cad khyab par byas te /
T02TD2584E:138a-34: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga lte ba smon mtshams dang ldar rim par rnam snang dang /
T02TD2584E:138b-1: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2584E:138b-2: rin chen 'byung ldan rnams 'khor dang bcas par gyur par bsam //
T02TD2584E:138b-3: lha re re'i spyi bo na yang aa dkar po re re yod par bsam pa de'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:138b-4: aa yis kun khyab spyi steng bsam //
T02TD2584E:138b-5: lhar gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam //
T02TD2584E:138b-7: de nas rang rang gi spyi bo'i aa las 'od 'phros pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi bcud bsdus te kha dog lnga dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD2584E:138b-8: rang rang gi spyi bor thim pa las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD2584E:138b-9: lus thams cad ye shes lda'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
T02TD2584E:138b-11: aa las ye shes lngas gang nas //
T02TD2584E:138b-13: phan pa'i gnod spyin chus btab la //
T02TD2584E:138b-14: zhes pa ni chu gtsang la aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2584E:138b-15: phung po lnga'i rnam par rtog pa sbyang ba'i phyir sngon du gsungs pa'i lha tshogs la sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:138b-17: dang po bkru ba las yin te //
T02TD2584E:138b-20: zhes pa ni bdag gi thugs kar aa dkar po bsam /
T02TD2584E:138b-21: de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'gro drug gi bag zhags sbyangs //
T02TD2584E:138b-22: che las 'das pa'i shes pa bkug la /
T02TD2584E:138b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcad pa la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2584E:138b-25: de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o zhes pa ni de ltar gong du gsungs nas ni ro'i sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga yin no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2584E:138b-26: de nas zhes pa ni gong du 'gro ba byas pa'i de ma thag pa nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga 'di bshad do zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:138b-27: shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste //
T02TD2584E:138b-28: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i ro de mandala gyi dbus su sna tshogs padma'i gdan la gzhag go //
T02TD2584E:138b-29: zhag gsum slob dpon smyung gnas pa //
T02TD2584E:138b-31: zhag sum kha zas kyi tshod bzung la //
T02TD2584E:138b-32: dkar gsum la sogs pa bza' zhing / nyin re la thun gsum gsum lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:138b-33: bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD2584E:138b-35: thun re re la lho sgo'i cho ga re re la'o //
T02TD2584E:138b-37: sems can kun gyi ngan song gsum //
T02TD2584E:139a-3: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2584E:139a-4: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02TD2584E:139a-5: 'khor lo lha rnams mdun bsam ste //
T02TD2584E:139a-6: zhes pa ni de ltar zhag gsum du byas pa'i nang par 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2584E:139a-7: aom manydzu shr'i badzra tsakra h'um zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams la //
T02TD2584E:139a-9: phyag btsal rdo rje bskyed sogs bya //
T02TD2584E:139a-10: zhes pa bcu yongs su dag pa dang sdom pa gzung bar byas la de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2584E:139a-13: 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2584E:139a-14: zhes pa yan chad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139a-15: de nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2584E:139a-16: las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139a-17: de nas sgo dbye ba bya ste /
