T02TD2584E:139a-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2584E:139a-19: mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2584E:139a-20: mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel //
T02TD2584E:139a-21: sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2584E:139a-22: aom manydzu shr'i badzra dha ronggha ta ya h'um phat ces brjod de //
T02TD2584E:139a-23: gzhal yas khang sgo dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139a-24: de nas rdo rjer sgrub pa dang /
T02TD2584E:139a-25: tshogs bsags pa yan chad 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139a-26: de nas sngags rigs kyis lha thams cad gsal bar byas la /
T02TD2584E:139a-27: thun gsum gyi rnal 'byor zhag bzhi ru bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139a-28: de nas gang zhig de nyid la //
T02TD2584E:139a-30: shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa yan chad kyis don la gnas par byas te /
T02TD2584E:139a-34: / dang po sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang //
T02TD2584E:139a-36: mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom //
T02TD2584E:139a-37: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsol ba gdab pa ste /
T02TD2584E:139a-39: de nas bri ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:139a-40: shi la phan gdags dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02TD2584E:139a-42: de'i don ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor lta bu la dbus kyi pho brang me thab tu byas la //
T02TD2584E:139a-43: gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba /
T02TD2584E:139a-44: zhes pa ro sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:139b-0: 'di las gsungs te gzhan du zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor te lta bu ni ro sbyong ba'i don du yin gyi dbang bskur ba la @139b sogs pa'i don du ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:139b-1: zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2584E:139b-3: de ltar rol bsnyen pa zhag bdun du byas nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i tshe sbyin sreg bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:139b-4: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02TD2584E:139b-5: de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas //
T02TD2584E:139b-7: phyi'i rim ldan ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2584E:139b-8: gar la sogs pa'i rol mos mchod pa dang phung po la sogs pa drang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:139b-9: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2584E:139b-10: sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis //
T02TD2584E:139b-11: shin tu bsgyings pa ldan byas te //
T02TD2584E:139b-13: chas gos ldan pa ni dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2584E:139b-24: ldan pa ni de rnams 'dzom pa'o ;
T02TD2584E:139b-25: / bsgyings pa ni shin tu 'gying bag dang bas pas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:139b-26: de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis//
T02TD2584E:139b-27: cho ga rnams ni dpyad par bya //
T02TD2584E:139b-28: dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas //
T02TD2584E:139b-31: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas /
T02TD2584E:139b-32: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad bya ste /
T02TD2584E:139b-33: de nas gzod ro de me thab tu bzhag ste //
T02TD2584E:139b-36: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa yan cad byas te /
T02TD2584E:139b-38: de yang ji ltar sbar zhe na /
T02TD2584E:139b-39: sngon du zhi ba'i skabs su ji ltar 'dir yang rgyas par byas la gzod bsreg pa'i las byas te /
T02TD2584E:139b-41: ro mchod gnas su bsreg pa dang /
T02TD2584E:139b-43: ro sreg rdzas su bsreg pa dang gsum du shes par byas la bsreg go //
T02TD2584E:139b-44: rdzas dbul la sogs pa'i rim pa sngon du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:139b-46: me nyid shi ba'i gnas sbyangs te //
T02TD2584E:139b-48: de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2584E:139b-50: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi chus bsangs la /
T02TD2584E:139b-51: me tog la sogs pa lnga dang lha mo brgyad dang /
T02TD2584E:140a-2: mchod pa nyi shu bas kyang mchod pa //
T02TD2584E:140a-3: bstod pa rnams kyis bstod do //
T02TD2584E:140a-5: ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do //
T02TD2584E:140a-7: de nas dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs pa ltar phyogs skyong la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2584E:140a-8: de nas de la lam bstan bya //
T02TD2584E:140a-9: tshogs bsag dge ba'i don la sbyar //
T02TD2584E:140a-10: zhes pa'i don ni lho sgro'i cho ga las zhes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:140a-11: de mthar bdag nyid rtogs sgom dang //
T02TD2584E:140a-12: zhes pa ni de ltar byas pa'i rjes la bdag nyid me dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:140a-13: de nyid mnyam shes pa ni bdag nyid yang dag pa'i thugs dang //
T02TD2584E:140a-14: tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa gnyis mnyam zhing dbyer med par shes par bya'o zhes ba'i don to //
T02TD2584E:140a-15: cis mi tshugs zhes pa ni de ltar rtogs na nyon mongs pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs so zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:140a-16: de la rtag gnas bde ldan dang /
T02TD2584E:140a-18: thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi don de la rtag par gnas na yang dag pa'i ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i don bde ba dang ldan no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:140a-19: de ltar bsgom pa'i don bstan nas skabs 'dir ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2584E:140a-20: sngon du bsnyen pa'i skabs su ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2584E:140a-21: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni rim pas /
T02TD2584E:140a-22: aa'i dang nyid du zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2584E:140a-23: rim pa ni ye shes kyi rdo rje mchod rten la thim /
T02TD2584E:140a-25: rdo rje rgya gram la de gzhal yas khang la /
T02TD2584E:140a-28: de dang po'i sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2584E:140a-30: de ye shes sems dpa' la /
T02TD2584E:140a-33: de nyid la aa'i dang nyid du //
T02TD2584E:140a-35: de ltar bdag gi ngo bo yi ge aa dkar po'i dang nyid du gnas pas ;
T02TD2584E:140a-36: de yang bdag lus aas khyab pa'o //
T02TD2584E:140a-38: de nas aa de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi shes pa 'og du zhu nas thig le byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dang du rtogs te /
T02TD2584E:140a-39: nye ba'i dpes mtshon na 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gnas te /
T02TD2584E:140b-1: de nyid aa yi byin rlabs la //
T02TD2584E:140b-2: aa nyid dbyings kyi dang nyid du //
T02TD2584E:140b-5: de nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor ba'o //
T02TD2584E:140b-6: de yan cad shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2584E:140b-8: // / de nas 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi'i don bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:140b-9: de nas 'khor lo bstan pa zhes pa'i don ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2584E:140b-11: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02TD2584E:140b-12: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02TD2584E:140b-13: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02TD2584E:140b-15: lus la 'khor lo bzhi gnas te //
T02TD2584E:140b-16: lte ba shes rab 'khor lo ste //
T02TD2584E:140b-17: rtsibs ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan //
T02TD2584E:140b-18: dang po'i rtsibs nas brtsams te dgod pa ni //
T02TD2584E:140b-19: aa a'a aam a'a: aa a'a aam a'a: aa a'a aam a'a: gnas so //
T02TD2584E:140b-20: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2584E:140b-21: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la mi bskyod pa //
T02TD2584E:140b-22: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02TD2584E:140b-23: rgyal po chags pa legs pa /
T02TD2584E:140b-24: sems ma rdo rje ma sgeg mo dang /
T02TD2584E:140b-28: spos kyi glang po ye shes tog dang bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2584E:140b-29: lte bar shes rab 'khor lo grags //
T02TD2584E:140b-30: snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni bcu gnyis rtsi bas dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2584E:140b-31: rim pa bzhin du dang por aa gdod /
T02TD2584E:140b-38: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2584E:140b-39: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan //
T02TD2584E:140b-51: spobs pa brtsegs pa dang bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2584E:140b-52: 'di ni snying ga'i sher rab 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2584E:140b-53: mgrin pa shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2584E:140b-54: bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2584E:140b-55: rim bzhin rtsibs gcig pa la aa /
T02TD2584E:140b-57: w'a ga'i shva ra pra dzny'a na ma: dgod //
T02TD2584E:140b-58: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2584E:140b-60: lte ba la snang ba mtha' yas //
T02TD2584E:141a-4: sgo ba lcags sgrog / mthu chen thob dang /
T02TD2584E:141a-7: dra ba can gyi 'od dang bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2584E:141a-8: mgrin pa shes rab 'khor lor grags //
T02TD2584E:141a-9: spyi bo shes rab 'khor lo ni //
T02TD2584E:141a-10: bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2584E:141a-11: rtsibs dang por ha ra ha ra /
T02TD2584E:141a-13: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'u rti /
T02TD2584E:141a-14: b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa sarba dha rma ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2584E:141a-15: pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la don yod grub pa /
T02TD2584E:141a-26: mtshog ma shes rab 'khor lor grags //
T02TD2584E:141a-27: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02TD2584E:141a-28: zhes pa bzhu btul ni 'khor lo'i gdams ngag bla ma las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:141a-29: de ni pho brang lha'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2584E:141a-31: lhag pa shes rab kyi 'khor lo dang gsum gsal bar bstan to //
T02TD2584E:141a-32: de ltar bsgoms pas 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:141a-33: de ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa //
T02TD2584E:141a-35: rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis de ltar bsgoms na 'og nas 'byung ba'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can bde ba thob ces gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2584E:141a-37: gzugs can ni de'i sku la mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2584E:141a-38: bde ba thob pa ni de'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //
T02TD2584E:141a-40: de dag spangs nas zhes pa ni //
T02TD2584E:141a-41: gong du gsungs pa'i don de ltar bsgoms pas khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i gzhan gyi don phyin ci ma log pa yang grub ste /
T02TD2584E:141a-42: rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs su skye bas na //
T02TD2584E:141a-43: rang dga'i lus su skye bar nges //
T02TD2584E:141a-46: des sa bcu la bgrod par bstan pa ni //
T02TD2584E:141a-48: de ni shes rab 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2584E:141a-49: de nas lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:141b-0: @141b 'di ni dbang bskur dam par gsungs //
T02TD2584E:141b-2: sngon du lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de 'dir dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:141b-3: de ma bskur na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2584E:141b-4: dbang bskur med na dngos grub med //
T02TD2584E:141b-6: de nas slob dpon gyis bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:141b-7: yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2584E:141b-8: yon tan ldan pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i sngon du slob dpon nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02TD2584E:141b-9: dbang blang ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2584E:141b-10: gzod slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2584E:141b-12: de la dbang byin yon tan grub //
T02TD2584E:141b-14: de nas slob ma gzhug par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:141b-15: dang po khrus byas rgyan gon te /
T02TD2584E:141b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te slob dpon du 'os pa'i bla mas las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2584E:141b-17: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
T02TD2584E:141b-18: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs gyon la /
T02TD2584E:141b-19: aom badzra t'i kashna h'um phat ces bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs dmar po bcings la /
T02TD2584E:141b-20: yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su blangs te ;
T02TD2584E:141b-24: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang /
T02TD2584E:141b-27: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyi rnam par bkod la phyogs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byed du bcug la /
T02TD2584E:141b-28: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes pa'i sngags kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dzin du gzhug cing de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2584E:141b-29: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bsgo ba bya ste /
T02TD2584E:141b-30: skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu //
T02TD2584E:141b-31: khyod ni ci dang ci la dga' //
T02TD2584E:141b-32: 'dod don gang yin khyod kyis smros //
T02TD2584E:141b-33: de nas slob mas 'di skad ces //
T02TD2584E:141b-34: bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2584E:141b-35: rab tu blta bar bgyi ba dang //
T02TD2584E:141b-36: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2584E:141b-38: de rjes slob dpon dam pas kyang //
T02TD2584E:141b-39: 'di skad ces ni brjod par bya //
T02TD2584E:142a-2: gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i //
T02TD2584E:142a-4: bdag gis bu khyod gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2584E:142a-5: grong khyer la yang grong khyer de //
T02TD2584E:142a-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2584E:142a-7: bu khyod rab tu gnas par bgyi //
T02TD2584E:142a-10: lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshol la //
T02TD2584E:142a-11: sdig pa ma lus sbyang byas nas //
T02TD2584E:142a-12: sdom pa rnams ni legs par zung //
T02TD2584E:142a-13: mchog tu sems kyang bskyed par gyis //
T02TD2584E:142a-15: de nas don dang ldan pa'i slob ma 'khor dang bcas pas /
T02TD2584E:142a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag byas la /
T02TD2584E:142a-17: bcu yongs su dag pa nas sdom pa gzung ba yan chad byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2584E:142a-19: ding khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2584E:142a-20: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2584E:142a-21: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyis //
T02TD2584E:142a-22: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig / dam tshig nyam par gyur ta re /
T02TD2584E:142a-23: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:142a-24: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig gis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:142a-25: de nas dam tshig phyag rgya 'di nyid dang mna' chu'i snying pos sngags la slob mas 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD2584E:142a-26: de'i mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:142a-27: h'um rdo rje dam tshig deng khyod nyid //
T02TD2584E:142a-28: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis //
T02TD2584E:142a-29: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2584E:142a-30: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2584E:142a-31: aom badzra au da ka tha:/
T02TD2584E:142a-32: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2584E:142a-33: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2584E:142a-34: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2584E:142a-36: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2584E:142a-37: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02TD2584E:142a-39: dad pa med la bstan mi bya //
T02TD2584E:142a-40: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo'o //
T02TD2584E:142a-41: deng phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD2584E:142a-42: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02TD2584E:142b-0: khyod kyis pa la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde @142b pa ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2584E:142b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur zhes smos shig par bsgo'o //
T02TD2584E:142b-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:142b-3: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste //
T02TD2584E:142b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2584E:142b-5: rdo rje ye shes bla na med //
T02TD2584E:142b-6: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:142b-7: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas de'i snying gar zhugs te rdo rje sems dpa' 'bab par gyur par bsams na 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:142b-8: yang ho aa ha zhes bya ba yang rang gi snying ga la bkod la /
T02TD2584E:142b-9: se'u'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying gar nges par byung la //
T02TD2584E:142b-10: badzra bandha trat ces pas de'i snying ga phye la der bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod la //
T02TD2584E:142b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bar gyur par bsams na dang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:142b-12: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis bdun nam brgyad rdzogs pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:142b-13: slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya //
T02TD2584E:142b-14: yig brgya phyed pas mnyam gzhag brtan byas nas //
T02TD2584E:142b-15: bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye zhing //
T02TD2584E:142b-16: snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta //
T02TD2584E:142b-17: sngags kyi bdag po yi ge aa dmar gsungs //
T02TD2584E:142b-18: brjod pas dang dag chags pas g-yo bar blta //
T02TD2584E:142b-19: slob ma'i lus 'di sgo ni dbye byas par //
T02TD2584E:142b-20: zhugs nas rdo rje byas pa'i snying la gnas //
T02TD2584E:142b-21: ma lus lus pa kun du bkang nas su //
T02TD2584E:142b-22: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan nas ni //
T02TD2584E:142b-23: sngags pas slob ma'i snying ga de la dbab //
T02TD2584E:142b-24: kun du dril bu'i sgra ni yang dag dkrol //
T02TD2584E:142b-25: lag pa padma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya byas //
T02TD2584E:142b-26: mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD2584E:142b-27: rang gi phyogs phyogs nas byon 'od phab pas //
T02TD2584E:142b-28: legs babs gyur pas rang gi bu la blta //
T02TD2584E:142b-29: gang zhig des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na //
T02TD2584E:142b-30: lag pa g-yas par til gyi sa bon gzhag //
T02TD2584E:142b-31: dbus su yi ge h'um yang rnam bkod de //
T02TD2584E:143a-0: @143a * // rdo rje 'od 'bar ba ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD2584E:143a-1: g-yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag rgyar byas pa yis //
T02TD2584E:143a-2: blang bar byas la me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2584E:143a-3: lus ni thal bar byas la rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD2584E:143a-4: bsod nams lus la'ang sngags kyi 'od kyis dang //
T02TD2584E:143a-5: ye shes bab ba nyid du bsams nas ni //
T02TD2584E:143a-6: rdzas bzhin 'bab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:143a-7: la la dag gis legs par bshad pa na //
T02TD2584E:143a-8: mche a'i myu gu cung zad gtsogs pa yis //
T02TD2584E:143a-9: rtse mo 'od dkar g-yo zhing dgod pa'i zhal //
T02TD2584E:143a-10: smin ma gdengs pas phyogs bcu ma lus pa //
T02TD2584E:143a-11: 'brug sgra lta bu h'um ni 'jigs pa'i sgra //
T02TD2584E:143a-12: sangs rgyas me tog chun phreng gnyis btags pa //
T02TD2584E:143a-13: 'od chen sna tshogs ldan par rang gi lus bsgoms la //
T02TD2584E:143a-14: sngags par rang gi bu yi mig phye ste //
T02TD2584E:143a-15: 'khor lo 'di dag ma lus bstan par bya //
T02TD2584E:143a-16: gang tshe der ni ci yang ma mthong na //
T02TD2584E:143a-17: rang las byung ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02TD2584E:143a-18: de yi snying la snang bar byas la de nas ni //
T02TD2584E:143a-19: 'di ni nyis 'gyur mig tu 'gyur bar bsam //
T02TD2584E:143a-20: de yi 'od kyis mig gnyis bskul bas na //
T02TD2584E:143a-21: de tshe cung zad nges par mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:143a-22: des kyang de bzhin mtshan ma ma mthong na //
T02TD2584E:143a-23: rjes mthun gnas pas bden pa'i byin rlabs bya //
T02TD2584E:143a-24: 'gro ba'i don la chags bral ma mdzad ces //
T02TD2584E:143a-25: brtul zhugs can gyis der sogs kyis bskul zhing //
T02TD2584E:143a-26: bus mo gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02TD2584E:143a-27: gzugs mthong phyir ni mchod pa dbul bar bya //
T02TD2584E:143a-29: babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2584E:143a-30: ye shes des ni pha rol sems su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:143a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02TD2584E:143a-32: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying ga'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:143a-33: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod par bya'o /'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di //
T02TD2584E:143a-34: dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas //
T02TD2584E:143a-35: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las //
T02TD2584E:143a-37: 'di ni dngos grub gang grub pa //
T02TD2584E:143a-38: rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang //
T02TD2584E:143a-39: bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa //
T02TD2584E:143b-0: sangs @143b rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:143b-1: bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-2: 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis //
T02TD2584E:143b-3: sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2584E:143b-4: h'um pra t'itstsha badzra ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02TD2584E:143b-5: de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog 'bab pa las brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:143b-6: lha rnams kyi khyad par dang gnas kyi khyad par las brtags te /
T02TD2584E:143b-7: gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2584E:143b-9: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bas gdon mi za //
T02TD2584E:143b-10: spyan la sogs pa rnams kyang ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-11: zhal du babs par gyur pa na //
T02TD2584E:143b-12: stod du babs na mchog rnams grub //
T02TD2584E:143b-13: rked du babs na 'bring rnams grub //
T02TD2584E:143b-14: ro smad phyogs su babs na ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-16: bar gyi sku la babs na ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-17: snying pa la sogs grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:143b-18: smad du babs par gyur na ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-19: mngag gzhug la sogs grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:143b-20: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-21: rim bzhin rnam par shes par bya //
T02TD2584E:143b-22: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02TD2584E:143b-23: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2584E:143b-24: gal te lha yi gzugs dag la //
T02TD2584E:143b-25: me tog ring du lhung gyur na //
T02TD2584E:143b-26: de yi dngos grub yun rings 'grub //
T02TD2584E:143b-27: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2584E:143b-28: gsangs sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag / gang du bkram pa'i tshul can ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-29: de yi sa ris de yin te //
T02TD2584E:143b-30: me tog der lhung de yi rigs //
T02TD2584E:143b-31: lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu //
T02TD2584E:143b-32: gal te nges par babs gyur na //
T02TD2584E:143b-33: gang du nye ba de yi rigs //
T02TD2584E:143b-34: gal te la la'i me tog ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-36: de la dngos grub mi 'grub cing //
T02TD2584E:143b-37: bsod nams dad pa rab tu chung //
T02TD2584E:143b-38: gal te me tog dor ba dag / ra ba'i ri mo la bab na //
T02TD2584E:143b-39: zhi ba byas nas de dag gdod //
T02TD2584E:143b-40: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de ste the tshom gyur na ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-41: mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gang yang nye med pas //
T02TD2584E:143b-42: des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:143b-43: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa na //
T02TD2584E:143b-44: don med phyi rol lhung na ni //
T02TD2584E:143b-45: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas su //
T02TD2584E:143b-46: de nas me tog dor du gzhug / snying por me tog babs pa ni //
T02TD2584E:144a-2: srad bu dag ni cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2584E:144a-3: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02TD2584E:144a-4: de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD2584E:144a-5: me tog rnams ni dor ba las //
T02TD2584E:144a-6: bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba //
T02TD2584E:144a-7: de la zhi ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD2584E:144a-8: sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas na //
T02TD2584E:144a-9: de ni slar yang dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te 'dor na yang //
T02TD2584E:144a-10: gal te legs par ma bab na /
T02TD2584E:144a-11: re thag bcad de slar gtang bya //
T02TD2584E:144a-12: de nas me tog babs pa las //
T02TD2584E:144a-13: lha yang dag par shes byas nas //
T02TD2584E:144a-14: phreng ba blangs te sngags s'i brjod //
T02TD2584E:144a-15: aom pra ti gri hna rva mi mam stva ma h'a ba la zhes brjod la de'i mgo la bcing ngo //
T02TD2584E:144a-16: ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ma nye bar mtshon nas //
T02TD2584E:144a-17: de la mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o //
T02TD2584E:144a-18: des ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:144a-19: gal te kha dog snang bar mthong na //
T02TD2584E:144a-20: de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02TD2584E:144a-21: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol te //
T02TD2584E:144a-22: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2584E:144a-23: mig gi ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2584E:144a-24: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2584E:144a-25: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2584E:144a-26: badzra tsakshu he badzra p'a sha zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:144a-27: de nas gdong g-yogs dkrol nas ni //
T02TD2584E:144a-28: dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya //
T02TD2584E:144a-29: de nas bla ma dga' 'gyur nas //
T02TD2584E:144a-30: slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo //
T02TD2584E:144a-32: da ni dang pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2584E:144a-33: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2584E:144a-34: sngags dang rigs pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2584E:144a-35: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
T02TD2584E:144a-36: thams cad khyod la mngon du gyur //
T02TD2584E:144a-37: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02TD2584E:144a-38: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD2584E:144a-39: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:144a-40: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhir snyoms //
T02TD2584E:144a-41: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste //
T02TD2584E:144a-42: bsam stan rta babs rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD2584E:144a-43: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02TD2584E:144a-44: khyams la brten pa rdo rje'i gdan //
T02TD2584E:144a-45: gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yi //
T02TD2584E:144a-46: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra pa yang //
T02TD2584E:144a-47: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2584E:144b-0: gdul bya @144b bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yis //
T02TD2584E:144b-1: me long ye shes rtag mi rtog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2584E:144b-2: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD2584E:144b-3: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2584E:144b-4: bde ba chen po zhes grags so //
T02TD2584E:144b-5: de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2584E:144b-6: ka ba dkyil 'khor dra ba ni //
T02TD2584E:144b-7: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02TD2584E:144b-8: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02TD2584E:144b-9: theg pa chen po byang chub sems //
T02TD2584E:144b-10: mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor bas na //
T02TD2584E:144b-11: rdo rje thig gis yongs btab cing //
T02TD2584E:144b-12: thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD2584E:144b-13: gang du 'jug pa de tsam gyis //
T02TD2584E:144b-14: mi tshugs pa dang mi log pa //
T02TD2584E:144b-15: bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02TD2584E:144b-16: de dag dbang por yang dag 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:144b-17: de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya ste //
T02TD2584E:144b-18: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2584E:144b-19: mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi bar du bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:144b-20: de nas ma long bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:144b-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2584E:144b-22: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD2584E:144b-23: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2584E:144b-24: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD2584E:144b-25: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2584E:144b-26: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2584E:144b-27: sems can don ni mnyan par byos //
T02TD2584E:144b-28: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skyes //
T02TD2584E:144b-29: zhes sgyur ma lta bur stan to //
T02TD2584E:144b-30: de nas bla ma de la yon gyi mchog phul te /
T02TD2584E:144b-31: gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:144b-32: 'di zhes bgyi ba rdo rje can //
T02TD2584E:144b-33: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgom pa //
T02TD2584E:144b-34: slob dpon zhabs kyi padma la //
T02TD2584E:144b-35: dang bskur phyir ni phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2584E:144b-36: slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba //
T02TD2584E:144b-37: rgyal ba rnams kyis dbang bskur nyid //
T02TD2584E:144b-38: sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa //
T02TD2584E:144b-39: skal pa che po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2584E:144b-41: de nas slob dpon gyis ho: zhes bya bas gzhu byin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de//
T02TD2584E:144b-42: phyogs bzhir mnga' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing /
T02TD2584E:144b-43: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02TD2584E:144b-44: de nas slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:144b-45: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la gang yang rung ba'i skur bskyed de /
T02TD2584E:144b-46: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2584E:145a-0: @145a * // g-yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po la gtsug tor gdugs dkar bzlas la dbub po //
T02TD2584E:145a-1: g-yon du dar tshon sna tshogs pa bkram pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2584E:145a-2: ba dan la aom yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la //
T02TD2584E:145a-3: me tog la sogs pas mchod la sgra sna tshogs pas bsgrags so //
T02TD2584E:145a-4: bkra shis kyi glu len cing phyi nang gi gar sna tshogs pa yang bya'o //
T02TD2584E:145a-5: de nas rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bum pa la sogs pa tham cad gcig tu bsdoms te byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bar bya ste //
T02TD2584E:145a-6: che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs shing //
T02TD2584E:145a-7: bdud rtsi'i chu yis rab bkang ba //
T02TD2584E:145a-8: rnam par dag pa'i bum pa 'dis //
T02TD2584E:145a-9: bu khyod la ni dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2584E:145a-10: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:145a-11: slob ma rnams kyi spyi bor bzhag pas me long lta bu'i ye shes la mi bskyod pa ngo bor gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:145a-12: de nas de kho na nyid bstan te //
T02TD2584E:145a-13: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2584E:145a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2584E:145a-15: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag //
T02TD2584E:145a-16: rdo rje snyems tshul bag po'i bdag / ces bya ba //
T02TD2584E:145a-17: 'di ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2584E:145a-19: srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:145a-20: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD2584E:145a-21: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:145a-22: de nas dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:145a-23: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2584E:145a-24: sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:145a-25: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2584E:145a-26: de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis //
T02TD2584E:145a-27: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2584E:145a-28: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02TD2584E:145a-29: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:145a-30: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2584E:145a-31: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2584E:145a-32: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02TD2584E:145a-33: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD2584E:145a-34: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2584E:145a-35: gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs //
T02TD2584E:145a-36: bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa //
T02TD2584E:145a-37: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02TD2584E:145a-38: sems can don ni ston par byed //
T02TD2584E:145a-39: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:145b-0: @145b phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags //
T02TD2584E:145b-1: gang gi lus kun bstan pas na //
T02TD2584E:145b-2: des na phyag rgya yin par grags //
T02TD2584E:145b-4: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:145b-5: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2584E:145b-6: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2584E:145b-7: de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar //
T02TD2584E:145b-8: khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig / ces bya'o //
T02TD2584E:145b-10: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:145b-11: theg pa che po rtog pa yi //
T02TD2584E:145b-12: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02TD2584E:145b-15: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2584E:145b-16: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:145b-18: rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:145b-20: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:145b-21: de nas dbu rgyan dang dar dbyangs su bcas pa byin gyis rlobs la //
T02TD2584E:145b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan //
T02TD2584E:145b-23: sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2584E:145b-24: rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang //
T02TD2584E:145b-25: dar dbyangs dag gis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2584E:145b-26: aom ratna aa bhi shi nytsa zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2584E:145b-27: mnyam pa nyid kye shes las //
T02TD2584E:145b-28: rdo rje rin po cher gyur to //
T02TD2584E:145b-29: de nas de kho na nyid bstan //
T02TD2584E:145b-30: ni ma 'di ni mchog yin te /
T02TD2584E:145b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //
T02TD2584E:145b-32: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2584E:145b-33: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2584E:145b-35: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02TD2584E:145b-36: bsam pa thams cad rab grub pas //
T02TD2584E:145b-38: de yang 'dod par rab grub phyir //
T02TD2584E:145b-39: 'dod dang thar pa'i bde chen po //
T02TD2584E:145b-41: de nas dam tshig bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:145b-42: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2584E:145b-43: sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:145b-44: pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni //
T02TD2584E:145b-45: sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2584E:145b-47: de nas gsangs ba bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:145b-48: dod dang bde ba thams cad dang //
T02TD2584E:145b-49: mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing //
T02TD2584E:145b-50: bdag nyid kyang ni pha rol gyi //
T02TD2584E:145b-51: bsam pa thams cad rdzog par gyis //
T02TD2584E:145b-53: rin chen khyed la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:145b-54: nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol //
T02TD2584E:145b-55: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //
T02TD2584E:146a-2: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:146a-4: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:146a-6: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do ;
T02TD2584E:146a-7: / de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2584E:146a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang //
T02TD2584E:146a-9: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2584E:146a-10: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02TD2584E:146a-11: bu khyod la ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2584E:146a-12: badzra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2584E:146a-13: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las rdo rje chos kyi sems dpar gyur to //
T02TD2584E:146a-14: de nas de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:146a-16: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
T02TD2584E:146a-17: 'dul ba thabs kyis mdzad pa ni //
T02TD2584E:146a-18: dag pa'i rol mor rab tu 'jug / ces brjod do //
T02TD2584E:146a-19: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02TD2584E:146a-21: tshon gyi nyes pas ma gos ltar //
T02TD2584E:146a-22: de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa 'dis //
T02TD2584E:146a-23: 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so //
T02TD2584E:146a-25: de nas dam tshig bstan te /
T02TD2584E:146a-26: cho ga 'di dag gang gang gis //
T02TD2584E:146a-28: padma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag //
T02TD2584E:146a-29: de dag der ni sbyor bar bya //
T02TD2584E:146a-31: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:146a-33: rgyal ba rnams la de phul la //
T02TD2584E:146a-34: sems can don du sbyin med mchog / bsten na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:146a-37: dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:146a-38: rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas ni //
T02TD2584E:146a-40: thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02TD2584E:146a-43: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2584E:146a-44: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:146a-48: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / padma rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2584E:146a-49: de nas dril bu byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2584E:146a-50: 'di ni shes rab nyid kyi dngos //
T02TD2584E:146a-51: shes rab da byings kyi rjes 'gro ba'i //
T02TD2584E:146a-52: de ring khyod la 'dir dbang bskur //
T02TD2584E:146a-53: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a dharma aa zhes brjod /
T02TD2584E:146b-0: bya ba grub @146b pa'i ye shes las sna tshogs rdo rje can du gyur par bsams la de kho na nyid bstan te /
T02TD2584E:146b-2: rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs //
T02TD2584E:146b-3: 'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che //
T02TD2584E:146b-6: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02TD2584E:146b-7: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2584E:146b-8: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2584E:146b-9: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2584E:146b-12: de nas dam tshig bstan te //
T02TD2584E:146b-13: thams cad nam mkha' sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2584E:146b-14: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
T02TD2584E:146b-15: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
T02TD2584E:146b-16: khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya //
T02TD2584E:146b-18: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:146b-19: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2584E:146b-20: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni /
T02TD2584E:146b-21: sems can thams cad gsad na yang //
T02TD2584E:146b-22: de ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:146b-24: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:146b-25: sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing //
T02TD2584E:146b-26: sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:146b-27: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod /
T02TD2584E:146b-30: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2584E:146b-31: sems can kun kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:146b-33: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:146b-35: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / las kyi rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do /
T02TD2584E:146b-36: de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lag pa de rnams spyi bor bzhag la //
T02TD2584E:146b-37: khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin te //
T02TD2584E:146b-38: rab tu gsang ba gsang ba'i ming//
T02TD2584E:146b-39: rdo rje che ge mo zhes pa //
T02TD2584E:146b-40: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2584E:146b-41: aom badzra n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor gyur to //
T02TD2584E:146b-42: de la de kho na nyid bstan te //
T02TD2584E:146b-43: de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2584E:146b-44: de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems //
T02TD2584E:146b-45: lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:146b-47: sna tshogs 'dul bar brtson pa yi //
T02TD2584E:146b-48: brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can //
T02TD2584E:146b-49: srid pa shin tu gnas mchog tu //
T02TD2584E:146b-50: go cha la sogs nges par gon //
T02TD2584E:146b-51: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs //
T02TD2584E:146b-52: dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs //
T02TD2584E:147a-0: @147a * // srid pa shin tu legs par bsgrub //
T02TD2584E:147a-1: sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpal byed mchog / ces brjod do //
T02TD2584E:147a-2: de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02TD2584E:147a-3: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2584E:147a-4: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2584E:147a-5: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD2584E:147a-6: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2584E:147a-8: de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:147a-9: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD2584E:147a-10: ci bde bar ni bsten bzhin du //
T02TD2584E:147a-11: dkon mchog gsum yang mchod par bgyi //
T02TD2584E:147a-12: rang nyid dang ni brten par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147a-14: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te /
T02TD2584E:147a-15: ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams //
T02TD2584E:147a-17: chags la sogs pa yun rings su //
T02TD2584E:147a-18: de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis //
T02TD2584E:147a-21: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02TD2584E:147a-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:147a-23: thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2584E:147a-24: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:147a-27: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2584E:147a-28: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:147a-30: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2584E:147a-32: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod de tha ma de rnams ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2584E:147a-33: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2584E:147a-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2584E:147a-35: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2584E:147a-36: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2584E:147a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya ti shtha ae sha stam dha ra ya mi /
T02TD2584E:147a-38: badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:147a-39: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2584E:147a-40: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02TD2584E:147a-41: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2584E:147a-42: byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD2584E:147a-45: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag la /
T02TD2584E:147a-46: dung lag pa g-yas par sbyin te 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:147a-47: deng nas brtsams te dbang bskur ba tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / chos kyi dung bus shig /'jig rten kun la zab mo'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs shig / de nas gzengs bstod de /
T02TD2584E:147b-0: 'di ltar snang ba'i @147b dngos po kun //
T02TD2584E:147b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2584E:147b-2: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2584E:147b-3: de bzhin gshegs par khyod gyur to //
T02TD2584E:147b-5: nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan //
T02TD2584E:147b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2584E:147b-7: khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin gyis //
T02TD2584E:147b-8: som nyi yid gnyis ma za cig / de nas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste /
T02TD2584E:147b-10: mthong ba'am ni zhugs pa yis //
T02TD2584E:147b-11: sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba //
T02TD2584E:147b-12: khyod ni deng nyid gnas yin te //
T02TD2584E:147b-13: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD2584E:147b-14: slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te //
T02TD2584E:147b-15: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2584E:147b-16: khyod ni mchog tu gyur pa'i //
T02TD2584E:147b-18: de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod de bkra shis brjod do //
T02TD2584E:147b-19: slob ma'i tshogs rnams dang sgra'i rnam pa mang pos sna drangs la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-20: de nas slob ma'i spyi bo nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor la phul te 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-21: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2584E:147b-23: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2584E:147b-24: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2584E:147b-25: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:147b-26: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2584E:147b-27: nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis //
T02TD2584E:147b-28: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD2584E:147b-29: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02TD2584E:147b-30: sems can kun la mi phan pa //
T02TD2584E:147b-31: nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni //
T02TD2584E:147b-32: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-33: de nas slob ma re re'i lag pa g-yon pas g-yas pa'i mthe chung nas bzung nas zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-34: de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bzod par gsol ba bya ste ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2584E:147b-35: bskyed pa'i mtshan tsho bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la //
T02TD2584E:147b-36: rdul tshon phyags te chu po chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-37: de nas gnas de yang dri sna tshogs kyi chus legs par byug par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:147b-38: de nas slob ma dam pa des /
T02TD2584E:147b-39: ci bzhed yon rnams phul nas su //
T02TD2584E:147b-40: gsang dbang nod phyir 'di skad zhu //
T02TD2584E:147b-41: bla ma dam pa bde gshegs gtso //
T02TD2584E:147b-42: khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2584E:148a-0: @148a * // lus ngag yid kyis bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2584E:148a-1: gsang gsum dam pa'i dbang mchog 'di //
T02TD2584E:148a-2: di ring bdag la gnang bar stsol //
T02TD2584E:148a-4: de nas bla ma dam pa des //
T02TD2584E:148a-5: gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtsam bya ste //
T02TD2584E:148a-6: shin tu dben pa'i gnas rnams su //
T02TD2584E:148a-7: mandala dri zhim bdud rtsis byugs //
T02TD2584E:148a-8: me tog bkram ste stan bzangs bting //
T02TD2584E:148a-9: de rjes slob mas shes rab ma //
T02TD2584E:148a-10: mchog dang rab dang 'bring dang mtha' //
T02TD2584E:148a-11: bla ma la phul 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2584E:148a-12: khyod ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD2584E:148a-13: bde gshegs rnams kyis bde ba mdzad //
T02TD2584E:148a-14: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis //
T02TD2584E:148a-15: yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa //
T02TD2584E:148a-16: ji ltar ji bzhin bdud rtsi yis //
T02TD2584E:148a-17: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02TD2584E:148a-18: de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi //
T02TD2584E:148a-19: sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar mdzod //
T02TD2584E:148a-20: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog / ma rig nges par rab rib rnams //
T02TD2584E:148a-21: gang zhig byang chub bla med pa //
T02TD2584E:148a-22: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02TD2584E:148a-24: de nas bla mas shes rab ma //
T02TD2584E:148a-25: mdangs ldan ma ni rab bskyed la //
T02TD2584E:148a-26: cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2584E:148a-27: thabs dang shes rab byin rlobs la //
T02TD2584E:148a-29: dgug gzhug bcing dang bstim par bya //
T02TD2584E:148a-30: chags pa bskyed phyir sngags 'di brjod //
T02TD2584E:148a-31: aom manydzu shr'i sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga badzra sva bh'a wa a'a tma ko& ham zhes brjod de /
T02TD2584E:148a-32: bsrub pa dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pas bde bar gshegs pa 'od du zhu ste /
T02TD2584E:148a-33: byang chub kyi sems su phab pas nor bu'i nang du bde ba rnyed pa thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo bkag ste /
T02TD2584E:148a-34: slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:148a-36: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'di //
T02TD2584E:148a-37: sems kyi sdug bsngal rnam bcom ste //
T02TD2584E:148a-38: gsang ba'i gnas dang dam par bcas //
T02TD2584E:148a-39: de ring khyod la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:148a-40: zhes brjod de slob ma'i kha ru'o //
T02TD2584E:148a-41: slob ma des kyang tshul rnam pa bzhis bdud rtsi sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:148a-42: des ni ngag gnyis pa dang rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pas gsung gi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02TD2584E:148a-43: de la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:148a-44: bla mas chos gos gyon la lag pa g-yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' ma chag par bcug ste /
T02TD2584E:148a-45: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2584E:148b-0: @148b dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gsal bar byas la /
T02TD2584E:148b-1: sngon 'jam pa'i rdo rjes lung bstan pa bzhin du mgrin gcig tu lung ston par bsams la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:148b-2: 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te //
T02TD2584E:148b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2584E:148b-4: dngos grub mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir//
T02TD2584E:148b-5: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2584E:148b-6: manydzu shr'i na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri si ddhi sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02TD2584E:148b-7: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do //
T02TD2584E:148b-8: de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
T02TD2584E:148b-9: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2584E:148b-10: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa ste /
T02TD2584E:148b-11: 'di nyid las thob par gyur cig / the tshom dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed cig / gzhan yang bla ma dam pas dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma rnams kyis grub par gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02TD2584E:148b-12: de ni slob ma gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2584E:148b-13: dbang rnams rdzogs pas rim par sbyin //
T02TD2584E:148b-14: gsang ba'i dbang dang zhes gsungs pa la de skad ces bshad do //
T02TD2584E:148b-15: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2584E:148b-16: nges pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2584E:148b-17: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i slob ma des kyang bla ma la 'di skad zhu ste /
T02TD2584E:148b-18: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2584E:148b-19: ji ltar mkhyen cing thugs chud pa //
T02TD2584E:148b-20: de ltar rjes su bdag dad na //
T02TD2584E:148b-21: de ring bdag la dbang bskur stsol //
T02TD2584E:148b-23: de nas bla ma des shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba brtsam ste /
T02TD2584E:148b-24: de yang dang la shes rab kyi dbang ni bu mo rigs ldan mtshan rtags can /
T02TD2584E:148b-25: bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad nyi shu lon pa bla ma la phul la bsam gtan gyi don drug dang ldan par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:148b-26: bla ma des shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2584E:148b-27: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD2584E:148b-29: rigs kyi bu mchog khyod kyis kyang //
T02TD2584E:148b-30: shes rab spang du mi rung ste //
T02TD2584E:148b-31: ye shes skye ba'i thabs yin pas //
T02TD2584E:148b-32: khyod kyis 'dod chags ma spang zhig / ces brjod do //
T02TD2584E:148b-33: de nas bla mas dri ba 'di yang gsung ngo //
T02TD2584E:149a-2: dri chen dri chu za nus sam //
T02TD2584E:149a-3: rakta ga pur tha nus sam //
T02TD2584E:149a-4: bud med dad pas bsten nus sam //
T02TD2584E:149a-6: snod ldan smros shig ngang tshul can //
T02TD2584E:149a-7: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD2584E:149a-8: shes rab dad pas bdag bsten to //
T02TD2584E:149a-9: dri chen dri chu la sogs bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD2584E:149a-10: rtag tu dad pas ston par bgyid //
T02TD2584E:149a-12: de nas bla ma dam pa des //
T02TD2584E:149a-13: shes rab ma gcer bur phyung la //
T02TD2584E:149a-14: lus dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la /
T02TD2584E:149a-15: me tog gi phreng bas mgo bcings la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2584E:149a-16: ston pa'i rang bzhin snying rje'i bdag / khyod kyis sems can don rnams gyis //
T02TD2584E:149a-17: mkha' klong padma bsten par gyis //
T02TD2584E:149a-18: bu 'di bde ba bskyed par gyis //
T02TD2584E:149a-20: de nas shes rab dam pa des lag pa gnyis dril bu bzung nas padma kha phye ste 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:149a-21: rmad byung nga yi padma la //
T02TD2584E:149a-22: bde ba thams cad 'di la rnyed //
T02TD2584E:149a-23: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun //
T02TD2584E:149a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung //
T02TD2584E:149a-27: sems can thams cad 'di ru grol //
T02TD2584E:149a-28: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02TD2584E:149a-29: padma zhes su rab tu gsungs //
T02TD2584E:149a-30: padma'i nang gi nam mkha' la /
T02TD2584E:149a-32: // 'byung ba lnga po rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD2584E:149a-33: lte ba la ni ge sar te //
T02TD2584E:149a-34: padma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2584E:149a-36: de nyid bdud rtsi dam pa ste //
T02TD2584E:149a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o //
T02TD2584E:149a-39: de nas bla mas slob ma'i lag pa g-yas pa dang /
T02TD2584E:149a-40: shes rab ma'i g-yon pa 'og tu bzhag nas 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2584E:149a-41: shes rab dam pa 'di yin te //
T02TD2584E:149a-42: khyed kyi ye shes skyed par byed //
T02TD2584E:149a-43: 'di dang khyed nyid ma bral bar //
T02TD2584E:149a-44: dad pas rtag tu rol mo gyis //
T02TD2584E:149a-46: shes rab ma'i lus la dkyil 'khor bkod la slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD2584E:149a-47: slob ma yol ba nang du shes rab ma dang 'dug nas ye shes kyi dbang nod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149a-48: de nas shes rab ma dang slob mas glo g-yas pa phab la nyal lo //
T02TD2584E:149a-49: dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149a-50: gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdab //
T02TD2584E:149a-51: g-yon pa glang po'i sna rtse yis //
T02TD2584E:149b-1: ; tshod zin bya ste brud par bya //
T02TD2584E:149b-2: lce yis kyang ni rol mo bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-4: gzod nyi ma dang zla ba mnyam par bya ste /
T02TD2584E:149b-5: dal nas dal nas bskyod pa las //
T02TD2584E:149b-6: 'byung ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis bde ba chen po'i dbus na byang chub sems gnas pa la ye shes kyi mes bzhu nas 'khor lo bzhi nas rim par 'bab ste /
T02TD2584E:149b-7: bolla'i rtsa bar phyin pa ni dga' ba'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-8: dbus su phyin pa ni mchog dga'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-9: nor bu'i rtse mor sleb pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-10: de ji tsam gnas kyi bar du bsgoms pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ste /
T02TD2584E:149b-11: dper na rus sbal lta bu'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-12: gal te bsdams pas ma thems na 'jig rten pa'i gnas su gshegs te bral ba'i dga' ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-13: don dang bral ba ni bral ba'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-14: gong ma mtshon pas dga' ba'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-15: byang sems de yi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2584E:149b-16: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin pas //
T02TD2584E:149b-17: dung dang nya phyis dag gis min //
T02TD2584E:149b-18: lag pas kyang ni mi blang ngo //
T02TD2584E:149b-19: bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-20: de zos ye shes dbab mchog thob //
T02TD2584E:149b-21: de yi don la rgyun goms pas //
T02TD2584E:149b-22: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
T02TD2584E:149b-23: skad cig gcig la gnyis med pa'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-24: brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral //
T02TD2584E:149b-25: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD2584E:149b-26: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
T02TD2584E:149b-27: mthar phyin gdams ngag ces kyang bya //
T02TD2584E:149b-28: de nas dam par gyur pa de la ni //
T02TD2584E:149b-29: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhir bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-30: de nas bkra shis gdon pa'i don ni 'jam dpal gyi sku gzugs spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2584E:149b-31: thabs dang shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02TD2584E:149b-32: byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dbang bskur //
T02TD2584E:149b-33: rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2584E:149b-34: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog //
T02TD2584E:149b-35: dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing //
T02TD2584E:149b-36: srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas //
T02TD2584E:149b-37: bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2584E:149b-38: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul phyung ma lus pas //
T02TD2584E:150a-0: sems can bde gshegs rtag mdzad @150a * //
T02TD2584E:150a-2: dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2584E:150a-3: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la //
T02TD2584E:150a-4: 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog rgyal por dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2584E:150a-5: lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang //
T02TD2584E:150a-6: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo yis //
T02TD2584E:150a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur //
T02TD2584E:150a-8: padma'i 'dod chags rnam dag legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02TD2584E:150a-9: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog / mkha' snying nor bu rin chen 'byor bas nyams dga' zhing //
T02TD2584E:150a-10: don rnam kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la //
T02TD2584E:150a-11: dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang//
T02TD2584E:150a-12: des ni khyed la dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs pas //
T02TD2584E:150a-13: bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa //
T02TD2584E:150a-14: des na kun gson 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la //
T02TD2584E:150a-16: rnam par legs gyur cig / ces brjod do //
T02TD2584E:150a-17: de nas spyod lam bya ba dang /
T02TD2584E:150a-18: bla mas gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2584E:150a-19: bkra shis kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2584E:150a-20: bla ma la yon dbul ba rnams ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02TD2584E:150a-21: bla ma dam pa s'u rya siddha sh'a ntim garbha ni /
T02TD2584E:150a-22: dam pa chos kyi mdzod du gyur pa la //
T02TD2584E:150a-23: bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi spyan snga ru //
T02TD2584E:150a-24: don dam zab mo dbang bskur zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yis //
T02TD2584E:150a-25: blo gros bzang po dran pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02TD2584E:150a-26: skye bo blo ngan mun pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2584E:150a-27: drug stong la sogs rgyud kyi don bsdus nas //
T02TD2584E:150a-28: nor bu gling ba'i sgrub thabs don dang sbyar te bris pa yis //
T02TD2584E:150a-29: bdag gis bsod nams rgyas pa thob bsdus pas //
T02TD2584E:150a-30: gang des 'gro kun sdig las rgyal gyur zhing //
T02TD2584E:150b-0: 'jam dpal chos kyi sku nyid thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i @150b 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2584E:150b-1: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dzny'a na k'i rtis mdzad cing de nyid kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
